La socia Juana  está muy agradecida con KIVA por ayudarla con el mantenimiento de su actividad económica la cual representan el sustento de su casa y su familia.
texts.en:
Juana is a member of the communal bank "Virgen Asunta de Calca" in the province of Calca del Cusco, Perú.  

She continues to work in the business of raising small animals such as guinea pigs among others. She has been working in this business for quite some time and it is going well thanks to the dedication she brings each day to her business.  She is a responsible and dedicated person and she wants to continue working in order to continue supporting her family. 

She asks for this loan to buy guinea pigs and food for her animals.

She is very thankful to Kiva for helping her maintain her economic activity which represents the sustenance of her house and family.

loans.use: to purchase guinea pigs and food for her animals

loans.name: Niño Salvador Group

texts.es:
El Grupo llamado Niño Salvador es de la ciudad de Concepción, una zona aun en crecimiento y eminentemente rural, donde están en su primer ciclo del programa de comité de mujeres, donde cada una quiere poder trabajar y ayudar a su familia por medio de sus ingresos.
La Sra. Martina es una de las integrantes, ella es una persona muy trabajadora que lucha por poder salir adelante, y todo lo que hace es por su familia, ya que son lo que ella más valora. Ella vende comidas de todo tipo que ella misma hace y después sale a vender de manera ambulante, y es por medio de este trabajo que tiene los ingresos para poder salir adelante.
Pide este préstamo para poder comprar carne, condimentos, panificados, verduras y demás, para poder seguir haciendo las comidas que ella misma hace y sale a vender.
texts.en:
The group called ""Niño Salvador” is from the city of Concepción, an area that is mainly rural but still growing.  They are in their first loan cycle with the Women’s Committee program.  Each one of them wants to be able to work and help her family through her income.  

Señora Martina is one of the members.  She is a very hardworking person who fights to be able to get ahead.  Everything she does is for her family, because they are what she values most. 

She sells all types of food that she prepares herself.  After she makes the food, she goes out as a mobile vendor to sell it.  It is because of this job that she has the income to be able to get ahead.  She is asking for this loan to be able to buy meat, condiments, baked goods, vegetables, and other ingredients, so that she can keep making the meals that she herself sells.

loans.use: to buy meat, condiments, baked goods, vegetables, and other ingredients to prepare food.

loans.name: Los Amigos De Saavedra Group

texts.es: Denis, tiene 30 años de edad, esta casado, tiene 4 hijos, reside en un sector del municipio de San Pedro Sula, Cortes. El siempre se a dedicado a la agricultura, cultiva café y hortalizas como tomate, cilantro, rábano, cebolla y frijoles, esta actividad la realiza desde hace 17 años. La producción es vendida en los mercados locales. El préstamo que solicita es el tercer ciclo en forma grupal y es por 5,000 lempiras con el cual va comprar fertilizantes para dar mantenimiento al cultivo de café y para cultivar frijoles. Su plan es mantener esta actividad ya que es la fuente de ingresos que ayuda a sostener la familia. El préstamo es grupal y se llama Los Amigos de Saavedra, integrado por 4 miembros que se dedican a la agricultura y viven en la misma comunidad. el monto del préstamo es por 22,000 Lempiras y lo invertirán en dar mantenimiento a la finca de café y siembra de frijol. En la foto se identifican de la siguiente manera: a la izquierda esta Denis, sigue Bernardo, Henry y Jonny a la derecha.
texts.en:
Denis, 30 years old, is married with 4 children and lives in the an area of the municipality of San Pedro Sula, Cortes. He always has worked in agriculture. He grows coffee and vegetables such as tomatoes, cilantro, radishes, onions, and beans, a job he has done for the last 17 years. The harvest is sold at local markets. The loan that he requests is the third cycle in the group loan and is for 5,000 lempiras with which he will buy fertilizers to maintain the coffee crop and to grow beans. His plan is to continue this work since it is his source of income and helps sustain his family. The loan is a group loan and is called Los Amigos de Saavedra, made up of 4 members who work in agriculture and live in the same community. 

The total of the loan is 22,000 lempiras and they will invest it in maintenance of the coffee plantation and planting beans. In the photo, they are identified as following: on the left is Denis, followed by Bernardo, Henry and Jonny to the right.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers to maintain the coffee crop and to grow beans.

loans.name: Guadalupe

texts.es: Doña Guadalupe tiene 48 años de edad, vive en unión libre con su pareja con quien tiene 4 hijos, vive en una colonia de San Pedro Sula. Ella se dedica a la elaboración de bloques de concreto para la construcción. Este negocio lo tiene en su casa desde hace 11 años y es su fuente de ingresos. Actualmente esta solicitando el sexto ciclo de préstamo por 15,000 lempiras para reparar una maquina de hacer bloques y comprar arena, cemento para la elaboración de bloques y vender. Su plan es que su hija termine de estudiar y que su negocio siga generando ingresos para su familia.
texts.en:
Guadalupe is 48 years old and lives in a common-law marriage  and with her partner she has 4 children.  She lives in the neighborhood of San Pedro Sula. She works making concrete blocks for construction. She has had this business in her home for the past 11 years and it is her source of income.

At the moment, she is asking for her sixth loan cycle for 15,000 lempiras to repair the machine that makes blocks and to buy sand and cement to make and sell concrete blocks. Her plan is that her daughter finishes school and that her business continues generating income for her family.

loans.use: to invest in fixing a machine that makes blocks and to purchase sand and concrete to make and sell concrete blocks.

loans.name: Alba Del Socorro

texts.es: Alba, es una señora de 46 años, originaria de la comunidad de palo grande del municipio de somotillo, se caracteriza por ser una persona honesta, trabajadora responsable en su trabajo y su familia, actualmente se desempeña como secretaria en la Escuela Ricardo Morales Avilés, de la comunidad de palo grande. se presento a las oficinas de ceprodel a solicitar un crédito para la compra de bloques, cemento y hierro para la construcción de un espacio para cocina y de esta manera brindarle una mejor comodidad de su familia.
texts.en: Alba is a 46 year old woman, originally from the community Palo Grande in the Somotillo municipality. She can be described as an honest person, and a responsible worker in her job and with her family. At the moment she works as the secretary at the Ricardo Morales Avilés School in the community of Palo Grande. She came to the CEPRODEL offices to ask for a loan to buy concrete blocks, cement and iron to build a kitchen space so she can offer more comfort to her family.

loans.use: to buy concrete blocks, cement and iron

loans.name: Vilma

texts.es: Vilma, tiene 34 años de edad, vive en unión libre con su esposo con quien tiene tres hijos y reside en una aldea de la Masica, Atlántida. Ella estableció su propio negocio de una pulpería desde hace dos años, vende carnes, lácteos, refrescos, harina, arroz, azúcar, café, pan, churros, achinería etc. Ella solicita el tercer préstamo por 15,000 lempiras para surtir la pulpería de productos básicos como embutidos, lácteos, sandalias y achinería para aumentar las ganancias. Su plan es aumentar las ventas y mejorar la calidad de vida con su familia.
texts.en: Vilma, 34 years old, lives in a common-law marriage and with her husband has 3 children. She lives in a town in Masica, Atlántida. She established her own general store business two years ago and sells meats, dairy products, soft drinks, flour, rice, sugar, coffee, bread, churros, and other low cost items. She asks for her third loan of 15,000 lempiras to stock her store with basic products such as cold cuts, dairy products, sandals and low cost items to increase her profits. Her plan is to increase her sales and improve her family's quality of life.

loans.use: to stock her general store with basic products such as cold cuts, dairy products, sandals, and other low cost goods to increase her profits

loans.name: Maria Jesus

texts.es:
La socia es la señora María Jesús, ella pertenece al banco comunal “Virgen Asunta de Calca” de la provincia de Calca del Cusco – Perú 

La socia María Jesús sigue dedicándose al negocio de venta de productos de belleza, la socia lleva buen tiempo dedicándose  a este negocio el cual le va bien gracias al empeño que le pone cada día a su negocio, la socia es una persona responsable y empeñosa, la socia a la vez sigue dedicándose a enseñar a niños de primaria, la socia es docente del nivel primario, la socia desea poder seguir trabajando para de esta forma seguir apoyando a su familia.

La socia solicita el crédito para la compra de colonias para damas.

La socia María Jesús está muy agradecida con KIVA por ayudarla con el mantenimiento de su actividad económica 
la cual representan el sustento de su casa y su familia.
texts.en:
The member is Mrs. María Jesús and she belongs to the “Virgen Asunta de Calca” communal bank from the province of Calca del Cusco – Perú.

Member María Jesús sells beauty products and has been dedicated to this business for quite some time. It's going well thanks to the effort she puts into her business every day.The member is a responsible and earnest person and also teaches primary school children as she is a primary school teacher. The member wishes to keep working so that she can keep supporting her family.

The member is asking for this loan to buy women's perfume.

Member María Jesús is very grateful to KIVA for helping her keep her commercial activities going as these support her home and her family.

loans.use: buy women's perfume.

loans.name: Hermine

texts.en:
Hermine lives with her family in Vanadzor city in Lori region. She graduated from Vanadzor State Pedagogical Institute, Faculty of Armenian Language and Literature. Now she works at a school as a teacher of Armenian Language and Literature and she has 15 years of work experience. She also has pupils whom she gives private courses, preparing them for the entrance examinations. Hermine is a respected and beloved teacher among her pupils and colleagues and she does her work with pleasure and devotion. She has two children who are school-aged. 

Hermine’s husband has his own small workshop of stone recycling and works by order. Hermine is asking for this loan for the purchase of a computer and some professional literature which will be useful both for her lessons at the school and for her private courses.

loans.use: to purchase a computer and some professional literature

loans.name: Irma Ondina

texts.es: Irma, de 34 años de edad, es madre soltera, tiene un hijo, reside en Macuelizo, Santa Bárbara. Su fuente de ingresos es vender ropa como camisetas, blusas, jeans, bóxer, calcetas, short, etc. ella vende de forma ambulante y por encargos. Solicita el tercer ciclo por 15,000 lempiras para comprar camisas, jeans y blusas y poder surtir el negocio y ofrecer mas al cliente. Su sueño es llegar a tener una tienda bien surtida y poder  sustentar a su familia del negocio.
texts.en:
Irma, age 34, is a single mother.  She has one child and lives in Macuelizo, Santa Bárbara.  Selling clothing such as t-shirts, tops, jeans, boxer shorts, socks, shorts, etc., gives her a source of income.  She makes her sales as a mobile vendor and by special order.  

She is asking for her third loan, in the amount of 15,000 lempiras, in order to buy shirts, jeans, and tops to stock her business and offer more merchandise to her customers.  Her dream is to come to have a well-stocked store and be able to support her family through her business.

loans.use: to buy shirts, jeans, and tops to stock her business and sell.

loans.name: Savin

texts.en:
Living in a wooden house located in Prasat Sambo district of Kampong Thom province, Savin is aged 22 years and married. She has three children, who are all dependents, and two of them are in school while the other is too young for school. To make a living, she and her husband have been farming rice for ten years.

This is the fourth micro loan for Savin with VisionFund and she completely repaid the past three loans, which have helped her make her living better. She wants to use her loan to buy fertilizer for her farmland. With this loan, she hopes to grow her business and earn a larger income to improve her family’s living standard and keep her children in school.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer for her farmland

loans.name: Dionisio

texts.es:
Dionisio es un pequeño productor de café de la zona Norte de Nicaragua. Su deseo es que su familia tenga mejores condiciones cada día. Por eso, cada mañana se levanta a trabajar su pequeña finca para ir construyendo la semilla que dejará a sus 5 hijos algún día.

Este año, él está solicitando un crédito para garantizar la compra de insumos que le permitan asegurar las actividades de mantenimiento de su cafetal. Con esta inversión, logrará una mejor cosecha y con ello mayores ingresos para su familia.

El sueño de este productor es que en un mediano plazo, la productividad de su finca se incremente y le permita garantizar a sus hijos mejores oportunidades para su formación y futuro.
texts.en:
Dionisio is a small-time coffee producer in the northern part of Nicaragua.  His desire is that his family would have better living conditions every day.  Because of that, every morning he gets up to work his small farm in order to continue growing this seed that he will leave to his five children some day.

This year, he is asking for a loan to take care of the purchase of supplies that will allow him to guarantee the maintenance of his coffee field.  With this investment, he will achieve a better harvest, and therefore a better income for his family.

The dream of this producer is that, in the medium-term, his farm’s productivity would increase and allow him to ensure better opportunities for his children’s education and future.

loans.use: to buy supplies that he will use in his coffee field.

loans.name: Jose Cupertino

texts.es: José, tiene 28 años de edad, vive en unión libre con su pareja con quien tiene dos hijos y reside en una aldea del municipio de Protección Santa Bárbara. Siempre se ha dedicado a la agricultura,  lleva 10 años de cultivar su propia finca de café, maíz y frijol, el café lo vende al por mayor en la zona. Solicita el segundo préstamo que es por 25,000 lempiras para comprar abonos, fertilizantes para darle mantenimiento a la finca de café y mejorar la cosecha. Tiene como plan sacar buenas cosechas y obtener ganancias para que a su familia no le falte nada.
texts.en:
José is 28 years old, lives with his partner with whom he has two children and lives in a village in the municipality of Protección Santa Bárbara. 

He has always been a farmer and has been growing his own coffee, corn and beans for the last 10 years, selling his coffee wholesale in the area. He asks for this second loan of 25,000 lempiras to buy compost and fertilisers to maintain his coffee farm and improve his yield. 

He plans to have a good harvest and obtain profits so that his family will want for nothing

loans.use: buy compost and fertilisers to maintain his coffee farm and improve his yield

loans.name: Teddy

texts.en:
Teddy has been operating a service-based business providing photocopying services in the local community. For more than seven years in this business, he was able to sustain and improve this business. His previous loan used for the business was successfully repaid. He finds ways to improve their situation  and is determined to provide his family a better and more comfortable living. 

Recently, he took a new loan to purchase materials for house renovation. He plans to use any additional revenue generated from his business to improve the general living conditions of his family.

loans.use: to purchase materials for house renovation

location.town: San Jose, Aurora, Zamboanga del Sur

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase poultry.

loans.name: Rosela

texts.en:
Rosela is 54 years old and married with two children. Rosela works very hard to provide for them.

Rosela runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 13,000 loan through NWTF to buy additional stock like snack foods, canned goods, soft drinks, biscuits, noodles, detergent soap, etc. to sell.

Rosela has been in this business for five years and sells a variety of items such as snack foods, canned goods, soft drinks, biscuits, noodles, detergent soap, etc. 

Rosela would like to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to buy additional stock like snack foods, canned goods, soft drinks, biscuits, noodles, detergent soap, etc. to sell

loans.name: Mol

texts.en:
Mol is age 46 years and married with one child who is not yet attending school. She lives in a rural village in the Prasat Sambo district, Kampong Thom province. She and her husband earn a living through cassava farming, which they have been doing for 27 years.

This is the third loan for Mol with VisionFund. Her past loans, which she has completely repaid, have helped her to better support her family and to have sufficient working capital for her business. Now she is applying for a new loan to buy fertilizers and seeds for her farmland. She hopes this loan will enable her to grow her current business to earn a larger income and also hopes to extend into a new business as well.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers and seeds for her farmland

loans.name: Jairo

texts.es:
Jairo es un caficultor del Norte Nicaragua. Toda su vida ha estado relacionado al cultivo del café y desde hace más de quince años maneja su pequeña finca donde la producción de café es su principal actividad económica. 

En los últimos años, la productividad de este rubro ha incrementado en un 20%, sin embargo, él está seguro que puede continuar mejorando esos rendimientos con un manejo adecuado de su plantación. Para ello, está solicitando un crédito que le permita garantizar de manera oportunidad la compra y aplicación de los insumos que requiere su cafetal.

Para este productor, su mayor sueño es que sus hijos puedan tener mejores oportunidades para su formación y crecimiento económico, por tanto se esfuerza cada día para ir ayudándoles a construir ese futuro.
texts.en:
Jairo is a coffee grower in Northern Nicaragua. All his life he has been linked to the cultivation of coffee and for more than 15 years he has managed his small farm where growing coffee is his main economic activity.

In the last few years, the productivity in this sector has increased by 20%, however, he is sure that he can continue to improve his income by managing his farm in the right way. For this, he is asking for a loan that will allow him to secure the purchase of the raw materials required for his coffee farm.

For this farmer, his biggest dream is that his children can have better education and economic opportunities than he did, so he works hard every day to help them build this future.

loans.use: purchase of the raw materials required for his coffee farm.

loans.name: Nihaya

texts.en:
Nihaya is a 49-year-old single Palestinian refugee who has been working as a tailor to make her living. Nihaya is a hard worker, who puts so much effort into developing her business and living situation in addition to covering her needs.

She runs her business from her house, where at the same time she is employed in a tailoring factory, to make sure that she can benefit from a stable monthly income.

Nihaya is acquiring a loan from Kiva's field partner Al Majmoua to buy new, updated tailoring machines necessary for her business development. She hopes that in the future she can open her own factory and widen her business sector.

loans.use: To buy new, updated tailoring machines necessary for her business development

loans.name: Analyn

texts.en:
Evelyn lives in Zamboanga del Sur with her family.  For fifteen years she has operated a general store selling goods in their local community to earn a living, while her husband earns money from their own farm.  She borrowed a loan from GDMPC micro credit to buy additional grocery goods.  

In the future, she wants to be able to give her children the education she did not have.  She plans to expand her store in order to gain more income for the future needs of the family .

loans.use: to buy additional grocery goods.

loans.name: Manar

texts.en:
Manar is a 29-year-old married mother of one child. She is a Palestinian refugee who works hard to develop her family's living.

Manar has been employed as a treasurer in a small restaurant for eight years. She is a hardworker who puts in much effort in covering her family's needs to support her husband who works as an electrician with a low income.

Manar is acquiring her second loan from Kiva's field partner Al Majmoua to pay for her expected baby delivery expenses. Her previous loan was invested in paying for her daughter's school tuition fees.

Manar is working hard to keep on providing her beloved family with the necessary standard of living in addition to the necessary education.

loans.use: to pay for her baby delivery expenses.

loans.name: Ailyn

texts.en: Ailyn successfully repaid her previous loan used in her piggery business. She had earned well from this and was able to put up a retail store in their village. Recently, she took a new loan from GDMPC to purchase more grocery goods to sell. Hoping for a better living, she is determined to provide a comfortable situation and better education to her children in the future.

loans.use: to purchase more grocery goods to sell.

loans.name: Helen

texts.en:
Helen is 45 years old and lives in the Philippines. She is married and has two children. 

Helen used her last loan to purchase fertilizers such as manure. Her farm has grown and become successful. She's now taking a new loan to purchase additional seeds, seedlings, and fertilizer for her new plot of vegetable garden. Positively, she hopes to be able to continue to grow and improve her farm.

loans.use: to purchase additional seeds, seedlings, and fertilizer.

loans.name: Roselyn

texts.en:
Roselyn, 36, is a married woman with seven children, four of whom are currently in school. She is a very hardworking entrepreneur. 

Roselyn has a food-vending business in the Philippines. She has been in this business for 26 years.

Roselyn requested a PHP 11,000 loan through NWTF to buy ingredients for her food-production business.

She successfully paid back her previous loan and is now requesting a new loan to further build her business.

In the future, Roselyn would like to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to school.

loans.use: to buy ingredients for her food production business.

loans.name: Susan

texts.en:
Susan works hard to support her family. Susan is married and has a food vending business in the Philippines.

Susan requested a PHP 13,000 loan through NWTF to purchase more ingredients like cooking oil, pork, salt, etc. for her business.

Susan has been in this business for 11 years now.

She successfully paid back her previous loan and is now requesting a new loan to further build her business.

In the future, Susan would like to save enough money to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase more ingredients like cooking oil, pork, salt, etc. for her business.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchasing more blood syrup, malarial drugs and pain tablets to expand her business.

loans.name: Mnacakan

texts.en:
Mnacakan lives in the Ararat region in the village Pokr Vedi. He is 29 years old and he is married. He lives with his parents, who are retired. Both of them are pedagogues and for many years they worked at the school. 

Mnacakan has no higher education and for many years the only way of providing for his family financially was doing construction work abroad (in the Russian Federation). During the period that he worked abroad, the nice and rich orchard of apricot trees that his father had planted dried up since his parents were old and could not take care of it. 

Since now Mnacakan has his own family, he decided never to leave his village again and also to restore their beautiful orchard. He hopes that after two or three years, he will have the sweetest and the best harvest of apricots as it used to be when he was a little boy and his father took care of those trees. 

Mnacakan requests a loan in an amount of 1,200 US dollars in order to start restoring his apricot orchard (to clean and to mold the soil, plant new tress, organize its watering system, etc.).

loans.use: to restore his apricot orchard.

loans.name: Mao

texts.en:
Living in a wooden house located in the Prasat Balang district of Kampong Thom province, Mao is a 30-year-old married woman with three children. Two of them are attending school while one of them is too young for school. 

To make a living, she and her husband have been farming rice for 23 years. 

Mao has been with VisionFund for three cycle already and now she is applying for another loan of 1,200,000 KHR. She is going to use her loan to purchase the fertilizer for her farmland. With this loan, she hopes to increase her farming business to earn a larger income to improve her family’s living condition.

loans.use: to purchase fertilizer for her farmland.

location.town: Kampong Thom Province, Prasat Balang district

loans.name: German Alcides

texts.es:
German tiene 45 años de edad y toda su vida se ha dedicado a la actividad agrícola. Su finca que se ubica en una zona de amortiguamiento de una reserva natural en la zona Norte de Nicaragua, cuenta con suelos ricos en materia orgánica y de gran potencial para la producción de café y otros cultivos.

En los últimos años, su producción de café ha venido incrementando. Para este ciclo, él está solicitando un crédito para la compra de insumos y fertilizantes que le permita garantizar el mantenimiento de su cafetal y aumentar los resultados de su cosecha. 

Con la visión de garantizar la alimentación, la educación y la salud de su familia, la meta de Germán, es hacer de su finca una unidad de negocio rentable que le permita dar a su esposa e hijos un mejor bienestar. En los próximos años, se ha propuesto continuar invirtiendo en su finca realizando actividades de manejo de tejidos y establecimiento de nuevas áreas de café, para incrementar su producción e ingresos.
texts.en:
Germán is 45 years old and has worked in agriculture all his life. His farm is located in the buffer zone of a nature reserve in the northern part of Nicaragua; it has soils rich in organic material and offers great potential for the production of coffee and other crops.

In recent years, his coffee production has been increasing. For this cycle, he is requesting a loan for the purchase of supplies and fertilizers that will allow him to ensure the maintenance of his coffee crop and to boost the yield of his harvest.

With the vision of ensuring food, education, and health for his family, Germán's goal is to make his farm a profitable business unit that will allow him to give his wife and children better wellbeing. In the coming years, he plans to continue investing in his farm by carrying out canopy management work and establishing new coffee areas to increase his production and his income.

loans.use: to purchase supplies and fertilizers for his coffee crop.

loans.name: Yesu Tease Group

texts.en:
Meet the members of the “Yesu Tease” group from Dansoman-Accra, a city in Greater-Accra region, Ghana.  They are all local entrepreneurs who have come to the micro finance institution, a partner of Kiva, to apply for a total loan amount of 1,800 GHS.  With the help of this loan they will be able to expand their individual businesses, make more sales, and consequently improve their living conditions.  They operate a clothing, provisions, and catering service.

Joyce is the featured borrower of this group.  She is 34 years old, single, and has no child.  Joyce has sold clothing for 4 years now.  With her share of this loan, she is going to buy clothing to sell to customers.  This will help her improve the business and her life.

loans.use: to buy clothes to sell to customers.

loans.name: Len

texts.en:
Living in a wooden house located in the Ro Veang district of Presh Vihea province, Len is age 39 years and married. He has one child who is dependent, and now he is in school. To make a living, he and his wife have been farming rice for 6 years. With this current business, he and his wife can earn 17,000 riels (KHR) per day.

This is the first micro loan for Len with VisionFund. He is going to use his loan to purchase fertilizer for his farmland. With this loan, he hopes to increase his farming business to earn a larger income to improve his family’s living conditions.

loans.use: to purchase fertilizer for his farmland

location.town: Preah Vihear Province, Ro Veang District

loans.name: Soem

texts.en:
Living in a wooden house located in the Prasat Balang district of Kampong Thom province, Soem is age 46 years and married. She has three children who are all dependents and now they are all in school. To make a living, she and her husband have been farming rice for 26 years.

Soem has been with VisionFund for three cycles already and now she is applying for another loan of 1,200,000 KHR. She is going to use her loan to purchase the fertilizer for her farmland. With this loan, she hopes to increase her farming business to earn a larger income to improve her family’s living condition.

loans.use: to purchase the fertilizer for her farmland.

location.town: Kampong Thom Province, Prasat Balang district

loans.name: Juana Luisa

texts.es: Doña Juana es madre de 3 hijos, todos estudian y su mayor deseo es que sean unos profesionales, cuenta con el apoyo económico de su esposo quien labora como albañil y ella vende cosméticos y comida en su casa de habitación, de esta manera ha podido salir adelante junto a su familia trabajando arduamente. Juana solicita el crédito para invertir en su negocio de cosméticos que en la actualidad tiene muy pocos productos de la demanda de sus clientes, esperando con la inversión aumentar las ventas.
texts.en:
Doña Juana is the mother of three children. They are all in school and her greatest wish is for them to be professionals. She has the economic support of her husband, who works in construction; she sells cosmetics and food from her house. In that way, she has been able to get ahead with her family by working hard. 

Hoping to increase her sales through investment, Juana is requesting the loan to invest in her cosmetics business because she currently has very few high-demand products for her customers.

loans.use: to invest in perfume, lotions, compacts, shampoo, body cream, and more.

loans.name: Robinah

texts.en: Robinah lives in Kampala, Uganda. She is married with one child who does not attend school. She is also looking after her father. She has been operating a hair salon from her home for two years, working seven days a week. She has no other source of income. She has requested a loan of UGX 200,000 from MCDT SACCO to be able to purchase hair oils and extensions and replace broken combs and worn out towels. Her challenges include seasonality. Her dream is to expand the salon and put up a sauna. She joined MCDT SACCO because of the testimonies of success stories that old members narrated to her. She rents a house without access to either electricity or piped water. Her major monthly expenses include school fees and electricity bills.

loans.use: to buy more hair oils and extensions and replace broken combs.

loans.name: Claudine

texts.en: Claudine is 24 years old. She is married with three children aged between three and seven. She owns a boutique and has been running the business for the past five years. With the loan, she would like to buy more rice, sugar and beans for sale. The profits from the business will be used to make more savings.

loans.use: to buy more rice, sugar and beans for sale.

loans.name: Romelyn

texts.en: Eumi is married with four children. She operates a food vending business to make a living. She has been in this field of business for five years.  Her husband vends fish in their village too and he earns better to provide for her family. Recently, she borrowed a loan from GDMPC to buy materials for house renovation. Some portion of her revenue was used for improving her house. In the future, the couple wants to own a retail store in their home where they could vend groceries. She wants to improve the general living situation of the entire family.

loans.use: to buy materials for house renovation.

loans.name: Joberth

texts.en:
Joberth works as a government employee and is able to support his family. He lives with his parents and is the one sustaining their living. He uses his motorcycle for transportation purposes. He also offers his motorcycle for rental to earn additional income for his personal needs.

He borrowed a new loan to cover the costs for motorcycle repair.  In the future, Joberth wants to put up a business in addition to his existing income.

loans.use: to cover the costs for motorcycle repair.

loans.name: Aurelia

texts.en:
Aurelia is a 63-year-old mother operating a service based activity providing sewing to their community with the help of her husband.  For many years the couple was able to provide for the family.  She had to be determined in her work to sustain her life.  

In order to enhance her services, she obtained a loan from GDMPC micro credit to purchase additional textiles and repair her sewing machine.  She hopes that she will live longer with her family.

loans.use: to purchase additional textiles and repair her sewing machine

loans.name: Mach

texts.en:
Living in a wooden house located in the Ro Veang district of Preah Vihea province, Mach is aged 39 years and married. She has three children who are all dependent and now they are all in school. To make a living, she and her husband have been farming rice for 10 years.

This is the first microloan for Mach with VisionFund. She is going to use her loan to purchase fertilizer for her farmland. With this loan, she hopes to increase her farming business to earn a larger income to improve her family’s living condition.

loans.use: to purchase fertilizer for her farmland.

location.town: Preah Vihear Province, Ro Veang District

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase more cassava, palm oil and coal nuts for resale.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase more blood syrup, malarial drugs and pain tablets to expand her business.

loans.name: Kouen

texts.en:
Kouen lives in a rural village in the Kulen district of Preah Vihear province. She is 46 years old and married with one child. In order to support her family, she and her husband have been earning a living through farming rice for over 10 years.

This is the first microloan for Kouen. She wants to use her loan to hire laborers to farm their rice. With this loan, she hopes to grow her business and earn a larger income to improve her family’s living standard.

loans.use: to hire workers to farm rice.

loans.name: Felicitas

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal LOS CUMPLIDITOS DE RIOBAMBA, el banco está ubicado en la provincia de Calca, distrito de Yanatile  y departamento de Cusco.
La socia Felicitas tiene 39 años de edad, es conviviente y tiene 03 hijos, la socia alterna sus actividades diarias dedicándose al negocio de cultivo de frutas como plátanos entre otros, la socia lleva buen tiempo dedicándose  a este negocio el cual le va bien gracias al empeño que le pone cada día a su negocio, la socia es una persona responsable y empeñosa siendo de esta manera que la socia saca adelante a su familia.
La socia solicita el crédito para la compra fertilizantes y abono.
La socia se siente agradecida por el crédito otorgado y se compromete a cumplir con sus cuotas establecidas.
texts.en:
Felicitas is 39 years old.  She belongs to the “Los Cumpliditos de Riobamba” communal bank.  The bank is located in the Calca province, Yanatile district, Cusco department.  She is in a live-in relationship and has three children.  

Felicitas alternates her time between her daily chores and her business growing fruits such as bananas and others.  She has been doing this work for a good while now, and it is going well for her thanks to the effort she puts into her business every day.  She is a responsible and enterprising person, and it is because of this that she is getting her family ahead.

She is asking for a loan to buy fertilizers and soil amendments.

She is thankful for the loan that was given to her and is committed to making her established payments.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers and soil amendments

loans.name: Angel Maria

texts.es: Ángel, tiene 31 años de edad, vive en unión libre con su pareja con quien tiene 3 hijos, y reside en una aldea de Nueva Frontera, Santa Bárbara. Hace 21 años que se dedica a la agricultura, cultiva café, maíz y frijol.  de esta actividad sustenta a la familia. El préstamo que ha solicitado es por 20,000 lempiras para comprar insumos como fertilizantes y pago de limpieza para darle mantenimiento a la finca. El tiene como meta  comprar un terreno para realizar la actividad de ganadería y también ampliar el cultivo de café.
texts.en:
Ángel is 31 years old. He lives in a common-law marriage with his partner, with whom he has three children. He lives in a village in Nueva Frontera, Santa Barbara. 

For 21 years, Ángel has worked in agriculture, growing coffee, corn, and beans; this is how he sustains his family. The loan that he has requested is for 20,000 lempiras [HNL] to buy supplies like fertilizers and to pay for weeding in order to maintain his farm. 

His goal is to buy land to raise livestock and also to expand his coffee crop.

loans.use: to buy supplies like fertilizers and to pay for weeding in order to maintain his farm.

loans.name: Brenda Xiomara

texts.es: Brenda, tiene 41 años de edad, esta casada con su esposo, tiene 4 hijos, vive en una aldea del municipio de Villanueva Cortes. Ella tiene su propio negocio en un puesto de ventas, vende achinería, ropa, gorras, juguetes, artículos para el hogar etc. Ha invertido varios prestamos para mantener activo su negocio, actualmente solicita otro por 10,000 lempiras para surtir de productos nuevos como achinería, ropa, artículos para el hogar y juguetes y hacer crecer el negocio. Su meta es mantener el negocio siempre activo y surtido.
texts.en:
Brenda, age 41, is married.  Together with her husband, she has four children.  She lives in a village in the Villanueva Cortes municipality.  

She runs her own business in a sales stall, selling knickknacks, clothing, caps, toys, household goods, etc.  She has invested various loans to keep her business active.  Currently she is asking for another loan of 10,000 lempiras to stock new products such as knickknacks, clothing, household goods, and toys, and to grow her business.  Her goal is to keep her business active and well-stocked.

loans.use: to stock new products such as knickknacks, clothing, toys, and articles for the home.

loans.name: Rosa

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal LOS CUMPLIDITOS DE RIOBAMBA, el banco está ubicado en la provincia de Calca, distrito de Yanatile y departamento de Cusco.
La socia Rosa tiene 35 años de edad, es separada y tiene 04 hijos, la socia alterna sus actividades diarias dedicándose al negocio de cultivo de frutas como plátanos entre otros, la socia lleva buen tiempo dedicándose  a este negocio el cual le va bien gracias al empeño que le pone cada día a su negocio, la socia es una persona responsable y empeñosa siendo de esta manera que la socia saca adelante a su familia.
La socia solicita el crédito para la compra fertilizantes y abono.
La socia se siente agradecida por el crédito otorgado y se compromete a cumplir con sus cuotas establecidas.
texts.en: This member belongs to the communal bank "Los Cumpliditos de Riobamba." The bank is located in the province of Calca, in the Yanatile district of the Cusco region. The member Rosa is 35 years old, separated, and has 4 children. She alternates her daily activities with working in her business growing fruit like bananas, among others. She has a good time working at this job, which is going well, thanks to the effort she puts into it every day. Rosa is a responsible and hardworking person, and this is how she raises her family. She needs this loan to buy fertilizer and manure. Rosa appreciates the loan being given to her, and she promises to make the monthly payments.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer and manure.

loans.name: Paula Elena

texts.es: Paula, tiene 41 años de edad, es madre soltera, tiene un hijo, reside en el municipio de Choloma Cortes. Hace un año que estableció una pulpería donde vende productos de la canasta básica familiar como arroz, azúcar, pan, manteca, frijoles, pastas, pan, huevos, harina, productos de aseo etc. Este negocio lo estableció después de haber trabajado en una maquila. El préstamo que ha solicitado es por 15,000 Lempiras con el cual va surtir de productos básicos como azúcar, manteca, arroz, harina, huevos, refrescos, pan, pastas, etc. con el propósito de aumentar las ventas y sus ganancias. Su idea es ampliar el negocio y hacerlo crecer.
texts.en:
Paula, 41, is a single mother. She has a son and resides in the municipality of Choloma Cortes. A year ago, she established a grocery store where she sells staple products for the family like rice, sugar, bread, lard, beans, pasta, bread, eggs, flour, bathroom products, etc. She established this business after having worked in a factory.

The loan she has applied for is for 15,000 Lempiras, with which she will stock staple products like sugar, lard, rice, flour, eggs, soda, bread, pasta etc. with the goal of increasing sales and her revenue. Her idea is to broaden the business and make it grow.

loans.use: to stock basic products like sugar, lard, rice, flour, eggs, soda, bread, pasta, etc.

loans.name: José Hairo

texts.es:
José de 59 años de edad,  es una persona casada que estudio hasta sexto grado,  vive junto a su esposa e hijos.  Se levanta a las 4:30 a.m. Junto a su esposa e hijos que le apoyan en la actividades agrícolas durante la mañana y en la tarde van a la escuela.

 José  junto a su esposa se dedican a la agricultura oficio que aprendió de su padre; para llegar a la parcelas camina 2  Km y trabaja durante la mañana y su esposa se dedica a los oficios domésticos y a ordeñar la vacas que poseen y así vender la leche en los alrededores.

El préstamo que esta solicitando, es para comprar una novilla, que luego se convertirá en vaca y le dará leche.   Su deseo es adquirir mas animales en un futuro.
texts.en:
José, 59 years old, is a married person who studied until sixth grade. He lives with his wife and children. He gets up at 4:30 AM with his wife and kids who help him with agricultural activities during the morning. In the afternoon, they go to school.

José, with his wife, makes a living in agriculture, a job he learned from his father. To arrive to the land he walks 2 Km and works during the morning. His wife works in the household jobs and milking the cows that they have, so they sell the milk in the area.

The loan that he is applying for is to buy a heifer that will turn itself into a cow and will give him milk. His desire is to acquire more animals in the future.

loans.use: to buy a heifer.

loans.name: Irma Araceli

texts.es: Irma, de 31 años de edad, es madre soltera, tiene un hijo, vive en San Marcos, Santa Bárbara. Hace 3 años que ella vende ropa usada  como vestidos, blusas, pantalones, camisas, ropa de niño y cosméticos. Las ventas las realiza de manera ambulante y por encargos. Este negocio es su fuente de ingresos para la familia. El préstamo que solicita es el tercer ciclo y es por 5,000 lempiras, con el cual va comprar ropa y cosméticos para la venta, ella quiere aprovechar esta temporada y aumentar sus ventas. Como meta tiene poder comprar ropa nueva y calzado para vender.
texts.en:
Irma, who is 31 years old, is a single mother with one son. She lives in San Marcos, Santa Bárbara. For three years, she has sold used clothing like dresses, blouses, pants, shirts, and children's clothes as well as cosmetics. She makes her sales door-to-door and through orders. This business is her source of income for her family. 

The loan that she is requesting is her third and is for 5,000 lempiras (HNL). With it, she will buy clothing and cosmetics to sell. She wants to make the most of this season and increase her sales. Her goal is to be able to buy new clothing and footwear to sell.

loans.use: to buy clothing and cosmetics to sell

loans.name: Saroeun

texts.en:
Saroeun is aged 47 and married with one child who is in school. She lives in a rural village of Preah Vihear province’s Ro Veang district. She and her husband earn a living through farming rice which they have been doing for 7 years. And sometimes, her husband also finds a part-time job as a worker for two years and both business can make them earn 17,000 KHR per day.

Saroeun has been with VisionFund for one cycle. She successfully used the previous loan to better support her family and increase her family’s business. Now she is applying for another loan. She wants to use her loan to buy fertilizer for her farmland. She hopes to grow her rice successfully and increase her current business to better her family’s living condition and keep her child in school.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer for her farmland

location.town: Preah Vihear Province, Ro Veang District

loans.name: Kea

texts.en:
Living in a wooden house located in the Ro Veang district of Preah Vihea province, Kea is aged 34 and married. She has three children, two of whom are in school while one of them is too young for school. To make a living, she and her husband have been farming rice for eight years and her husband has been a worker for two years. With these current businesses, she and her husband can earn 19,000 KHR per day.

This is the third micro loan for Kea with VisionFund and now she is applying for another loan of 1,000,000 KHR. She is going to use her loan to purchase fertilizer for her farmland. With this loan, she hopes to increase her farming business to earn a larger income to improve her family’s living condition.

loans.use: to purchase fertilizer for her farmland

location.town: Preah Vihear Province, Ro Veang District

loans.name: Luciano

texts.en: Luciano operates a fishing business, selling seafood products including fish, crabs, and shrimp in the local community to earn a living. For the past seven years in this business, Luciano has earned well enough for the family and was able to repay his previous loan successfully. He is now taking a new loan to purchase new fishing nets. Hopeful enough to survive a living, he wants to provide a better living to his family in the near future.

loans.use: to purchase new fishing nets

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase more palm oil and soap to expand her business.

loans.name: Sopheap

texts.en:
Living in a wooden house located in the Ro Veang district of Preah Vihea province, Sopheap is aged 37 and married. She has two children, who are dependent and now they are all in school. In order to support the family, she and her husband earn a living through farming rice for 12 years, selling some groceries for five years and doing work as a paid worker for 12 years. With these current businesses, she and her husband can earn 24,000 KHR per day.

This is the fourth micro loan for Sopheap with VisionFund. She successfully used the previous loan to better support her family and increase her family’s business. Now she is applying for another loan. She wants to use her loan to buy fertilizer for her farmland. She hopes to grow her rice successfully and increase her current business to better her family’s living conditions and keep her child in school.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer for her farmland

location.town: Preah Vihear Province, Ro Veang District

loans.name: Jose Isaias

texts.es: José, tiene 26 años de edad, esta casado, tiene dos hijos, vive en una aldea del municipio de Protección Santa Bárbara. Tiene 8 años de dedicarse al cultivo de maíz, frijol, café y hortalizas. Esta actividad es su fuente de ingresos. Ha solicitado un segundo préstamo por 25,000 lempiras para comprar fertilizantes, pago de mano de obra y poderle dar mantenimiento a su finca de café, y cultivos de maíz, frijol y hortalizas, con esta inversión va poder mejorar la producción y cumplir su sueño de seguir trabajando para que el negocio siga funcionando y así darle buen estudio a sus hijos.
texts.en:
José is 26 years old, married, has two children and lives in a village of the municipality of Protección Santa Bárbara. He has been growing corn crops, beans, coffee and vegetables for 8 years. This activity is his source of income.

He has applied for a second loan for 25,000 lempiras to buy fertilizers, pay for labor and maintain his coffee farm, corn, bean and vegetable crops. With this investment, he will be able to improve production and fulfill his dream of continuing to work so that the business continues functioning and thereby give his children a good schooling.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers, pay for labor and maintain his coffee farm, corn, bean and vegetable crops.

loans.name: Jose Abel

texts.es:
José es un pequeño emprendedor de 32 años, dedicado a la producción de café. Vive en su finca con su esposa y sus dos hijos que estudian en la escuela de su comunidad. Desde hace aproximadamente 8 años, el café ha sido la principal fuente de ingresos para esta familia. En los últimos tres ciclos, ha logrado incrementar su producción en un 30%.

Para este ciclo, él está solicitando un crédito para la compra y aplicación oportuna de los insumos y fertilizantes que requiere su cafetal, y lograr continuar mejorando la productividad de su finca. El está seguro que con un buen plan de inversión y la correcta administración de los recursos con los que cuenta, logrará aumentar la cantidad de su café y con ello los ingresos para garantizar un mejor bienestar a su familia.
texts.en:
José is a small entrepreneur of 32, dedicated to coffee production. He lives on his coffee farm with his wife and two children who study in the school in his community. Since approximately 8 years ago, coffee has been the main source of income for this family. In the last three loan cycles, he has achieved increasing his production by 30%.

For this cycle, he is applying for a loan for the purchase and timely application of supplies and fertilizers that his coffee plants need, and achieve continuing to improve the productivity of his farm. He is sure that with a good investment plan and the correct management of his resources, he will achieve increasing the quantity of his coffee and thereby his income to guarantee a better wellbeing for his family.

loans.use: to buy supplies and fertilizers for his coffee farm.

loans.name: Freddy Joel

texts.es:
Freddy es un pequeño productor de café de la zona Norte de Nicaragua. Se conoce por ser un trabajador esforzado, con el sueño de dar a su familia mejores condiciones a las que él ha tenido acceso. 

En estos últimos años, los rendimientos de café en su pequeña finca se han incrementado en un 20%, y para este ciclo su meta es aumentar esa cantidad. Para ello, está solicitando un financiamiento para la compra de abonos y fertilizantes que requiere su plantación de café en este año. El confía en que garantizando el adecuado manejo de su cafetal logrará mejorar su producción y con ello los ingresos para su familia.
texts.en:
Freddy is a small-scale coffee producer in the northern part of Nicaragua. He is known for being a hard worker who dreams of giving his family better conditions than what he had access to.

In recent years, the coffee yield on his small farm has increased some 20%, and for this cycle, his goal is to increase that quantity. For that reason, he is requesting a loan to purchase soil amendments and fertilizers that his coffee crop needs this year. 

He trusts that by ensuring proper management of his coffee crop, he will succeed in improving his production and with that, his income for his family.

loans.use: to buy soil amendments and fertilizers

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To buy requested bedroom furnishings at her house

loans.name: 15 De Mayo Group

texts.es:
El grupo llamado 15 de mayo  está en su ciclo número 2 del programa de comité de mujeres, es de la ciudad de Concepción, la cual es una zona un poco alejada de la zona céntrica y aún se encuentra en crecimiento. Es una zona rural, por lo que las integrantes de este grupo quieren luchar por ir creciendo y dar a la zona donde viven un mejor ambiente y que vayan creciendo lentamente.
La Sra. Eva es una de las integrantes,  tiene su pequeño negocio de venta de productos variados en el mercado, con el cual le hace crecer a su hijo y lucha por darle todo lo que ella no pudo tener. Desea que conforme pase el tiempo, y por medio de la ayuda de todas las personas de su zona puedan ir mejorando su entorno y así ofrecer una mayor seguridad a sus familias, también poder procurar para ellos un mejor futuro.
Solicita de este crédito para la compra de productos varios para la venta, como jabones, aceites, condimentos y demás y de esa forma poder seguir con su trabajo como lo viene haciendo, luchando siempre por mejorar.
texts.en:
The group called "15 de mayo" is in its second cycle of the women's committee program. It is in the city of Concepción, which is in a zone a bit far from the central zone and yet it is found growing. It's a rural zone, therefore the members of this group want to strive to grow and give give a better environment to the zone where they live; they are growing it slowly.

Eva is one of the members. She has her small business selling various products in the market, with which she raises her son and fights to give him all that she couldn't have. She wishes that with the passage of time and by the help of all of the people in her area, they can improve their surroundings and thereby offer better security to their families. She also desires to be able to ensure a better future for them.

She is applying for this loan for the purchase of various products for selling, like soap, oils, condiments and more. In this manner, she will be able to continue with her work that she is doing, always striving to improve.

loans.use: To buy soap, oils, condiments and more for selling.

loans.name: Sakhorn

texts.en:
Living in a wooden house located in the Ro Veang district of Preah Vihea province, Sakhorn is 60 years old and married. She has one child, who is dependent, and now he is in school. In order to support the family, she and her husband have been earning a living by farming rice and cassava for 30 years. Her husband is also a teacher. With these current businesses, she and her husband can earn 25,000 riels per day.

This is the fifth micro loan for Sakhorn with VisionFund. She successfully used her previous loans to better support her family and expand her family’s business. Now she is applying for another loan. She wants to use her loan to buy fertilizer for her farmland. She hopes to earn more income from her current business.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer for her farmland

location.town: Preah Vihear Province, Ro Veang District

loans.name: Monina

texts.en: Monina runs a general store selling goods in her local community to earn a living and has been doing it for five years now. She borrowed a loan from GDMPC micro credit to buy additional stock like canned goods, noodles, and spices. She plans to expand her store in order to gain more income for the family's needs.

loans.use: to buy additional stock like canned goods, noodles, and spices.

loans.name: Nuon

texts.en:
Nuon lives in a rural village, Borey Cholsa district of Takeo province. She is 58-years-old and married with three children, one of them is in school while two of them are too young for school. In order to support her family, she and her husband have earned a living through farming rice for the past 35 years and she also has worked as a paid construction worker for the past 14 years. With these businesses she and her husband can earn about 38,000 KHR per day.

This is the first micro loan for Nuon. She successfully used the previous loan to better support her family and increase her family’s business, and now she is applying for a new loan. She wants to use her loan to buy fertilizer for her farmland. With this loan, she hopes to grow her business and earn a larger income to improve her family’s living standards and keep her children in school.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer for her farmland

loans.name: Nelson

texts.es:
Nelson tiene 34 años y toda su vida ha estado relacionado a la caficultura. Para él este rubro tiene un gran potencial económico, por eso se esfuerza cada día para lograr mejores rendimientos y obtener mayores ingresos que le permita darle a su familia una mejor estabilidad económica.

Para este ciclo, él está solicitando un crédito que le permita comprar los insumos que requiere su plantación de café y con ello lograr una buena cosecha. El dice que “esta inversión, sumado a mi cualidad innovadora y deseo de mejorar” le ayudará a alcanzar su sueño de cosechar unos 500 quintales de café en un mediano plazo. Para él, este rubro siempre va a tener mercado, por lo que está seguro de continuar trabajando en esto le ayudará a salir adelante con familia.
texts.en:
Nelson is 34 years old and all his life he has been involved in coffee farming. For him, this field has great economic potential, therefore he works hard every day to achieve better yields and higher earnings that allow him to give his family a better economic stability.

For this cycle, he is asking for loan that allows him to buy the supplies required for his coffee plantation and with them to achieve a good harvest. He says that "this investment, coupled with my innovative quality and my desire to improve" will help him to achieve his dream of a harvest of 500 quintals of coffee in the medium term. For him, this field will always have market, so it is secure for him to continue working on this and it will help him to get by with his family.

loans.use: to buy the supplies which are needed for his coffee farming

loans.name: Wilberto Manuel

texts.es: Wilberto es un señor solitario, sus hijos son mayores de edad e independientes, ejercía su profesión como docente de secundaria, pero por el bajo salario decidió dedicarse por completo a la venta de libros los cuales sale a ofrecer a los departamentos de Managua, Iglesias, así como universidades, solicita el crédito para comprar variedades de libros que pueda ser del agrado de su clientela, de esta manera poder mantener sus ingresos diarios, esperando en un futuro establecer su negocio en un lugar fijo.
texts.en:
Wilberto is a solitary man; his children are grown-up and live independently.  

He used to practice his profession as a secondary teacher, but due to the low salary he decided to work full-time selling books.  He heads out to offer them for sale in the Managua and Iglesias areas, as well as the universities.  

He is asking for this loan to buy a variety of books that will be to the liking of his customers.  In this way he can keep up his daily income.  In the future, he is hoping to set up his business in a fixed location.

loans.use: to buy a variety of books

loans.name: Carmen

texts.es:
Carmen tiene 58 años. Ella no tuvo acceso a educación formal, pero aprendió a leer y a escribir. Vive en una comunidad al norte de Nicaragua, y se dedica a la producción de café, la cual es su principal fuente de ingresos.

Para esta mujer, su reto ha sido incrementar los rendimientos de su finca. Este año, ella está solicitando un crédito que le permita mejorar la cantidad y calidad de su cosecha, mediante la compra y aplicación oportuna de insumos y fertilizantes. 

Su carácter alegre y entusiasta es algo que caracteriza a esta emprendedora, lo cual se ve reflejado en el trabajo que realiza en su pequeña finca. Su sueño es que su finca sea considerada como una unidad modelo de producción de café con alto rendimiento y calidad, para ello se esfuerza cada día segura de que este rubro tiene un gran potencial económico.
texts.en:
Carmen is 58 years old.  She didn’t have access to a formal education, but she did learn to read and write.  She lives in a community in the northern part of Nicaragua.  She works in coffee production, which is her main source of income.

For this woman, her challenge has always been to increase the yield of her farm.  This year, she is asking for a loan that will allow her to improve the quantity and quality of her harvest through the purchase and timely application of fertilizers and the like.

Her happy and enthusiastic personality is something that really characterizes this entrepreneur, and it is reflected in the work that she does on her small farm.  Her dream is that her farm would be considered to be a model of coffee production with a good, high-quality yield.  Because of that, she works hard every day, sure that this line of work has great economic potential.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers

loans.name: Yadira De La Concepcion

texts.es: Doña Yadira, siempre trabaja para sacar adelante a su familia su dos hijos ya están grandes uno adolescente y el otro en edad escolar, su prioridad para ella son sus hijos, este crédito lo solicita para la compra de Paca de Ropa Golden y así incrementar sus ganancias mensuales, ella labora para un colegio publico desde hace ya varios años, su hija mayor le apoya con la venta de ropa, Agradece el apoyo que Kiva y Afodenic le han brindado
texts.en:
Doña Yadira always works to get her family ahead.  Her two children are already getting big—one is a teenager and the other is school-aged.  Her priority is her children.  She has worked for a public school for a number of years.  

She is asking for this loan to buy a bale of quality clothing and so increase her monthly earnings.  Her oldest daughter helps her with the clothing sales.  She is grateful for the support that Kiva and Afodenic have given her.

loans.use: to buy a bale of clothing

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to maintain his pineapple crops.

loans.name: Virgen Inmaculada Concepcion De Pantorrilla Group

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal VIRGEN INMACULADA CONCEPCION DE PANTORRILLA, él banco está ubicado en el distrito de Yanatile, provincia de Calca y departamento de Cusco.
La socia Graciela tiene 40 años de edad tiene 02 hijos y es conviviente, la socia alterna sus actividades diarias dedicándose al cultivo de frutas como plátanos entre otros, la socia lleva años dedicándose a este negocio el cual le va bien gracias al empeño que le pone cada di a su negocio, la socia es una persona responsable y empeñosa, la socia desea poder seguir trabajando para de esta forma seguir apoyando a su familia.
La socia solicito el crédito para la compra de fertilizantes y abono.
La persona que sale con la cara tapada no pertenece al banco comunal.
Los demás socios se dedican a la cultivo de hortalizas, cultivo de frutas, cultivo de cereales, tienda de abarrotes.
La socia se siente agradecida por el crédito otorgado y se compromete a cumplir con sus cuotas establecidas.
texts.en:
The member belongs to the "Virgen Inmaculada Concepción de Pantorrilla" communal bank. The bank is located in the district of Yanatile, in the province of Calca, which is in the department of Cusco.

The member, Graciela, is 40 years old, has two children, and lives with her spouse. The member spends her time alternating between her daily tasks and the cultivation of fruit, including bananas. She has worked in this business for years, and it has gone well for her, thanks to the effort that she puts into it every day. She is a hardworking and responsible person. She would like to continue working in order to continue supporting her family.

Graciela is requesting the loan for the purchase of fertilizers and soil amendments. 

The person whose face is covered is not a member of the communal bank.

The female members earn their livings in the cultivation of vegetables, the cultivation of fruits, the cultivation of grains, and with a grocery store.

Graciela feels grateful for the loan granted, and she promises to make the established loan payments.

loans.use: to purchase fertilizers and soil amendments.

loans.name: Shoira

texts.en:
Shoira is 37 years old. She is a careful mother of four children. Her children are schoolboys. Her husband’s income is small. With the aim to provide for the family, she began her own business deal six years ago. She sells food items. Her store is located near her house. Shoira sells food items such as pasta, sugar, tomatoes, etc. Her customers are her neighbors. Shoira manages the business alone. She always tries to sells fresh and high quality food items. 

She is asking for a loan of 7,500 Somoni to buy food items for increasing her working capital. She awaits your mercy.

loans.use: To buy food items for increasing her working capital

loans.name: Mamacha Del Carmen-Vilcabamba Group

texts.es:
Maria Dolores y varios vecinos conforman el banco comunal “Mamacha del Carmen” la mayoria de los vecinos viven en la comunidad de Vilcabamba. La comunidad de Vilcabamba esta dentro del distrito de Caicay dentro de la provincia de Paucartambo del departamento del Cusco). Maria Dolores tiene 54 años edad, tiene dos hijos varones y vive en la misma ciudad donde nació. Maria Dolores tiene un fundo donde produce maíz blanco. Maria Dolores trabaja desde el año 1987 en su fundo, Su fundo está ubicado en la comunidad de Vilcabamba y también se dedica a la crianza de animales menores como por ejemplo cuyes y gallinas. Maria Dolores requiere el préstamo para comprar más animales menores cuyes. Maria Dolores pertenece al banco comunal “Mamacha del Carmen” de la Asociación Arariwa. El banco comunal esta en el tercer año de funcionamiento y les va muy bien.
 
Este banco comunal está conformado por varias personas que buscan a cada momento las oportunidades para salir adelante y con su esfuerzo diario entregar un mejor futuro a sus hijos. Los socios  se dedican al agricultura, artesanía, venta de comida, ganadería, crianza de animales menores y otros. (La persona que aparece en la parte inferior de la fotografía llego tarde a la reunión).
texts.en:
María Dolores and several neighbors make up the "Mamacha del Carmen" communal bank. The majority of the neighbors live in the community of Vilcabamba. Vilcabamba is in the district of Caicay, within the province of Paucartambo in the department of Cusco. 

María Dolores is 54 years old. She has two sons and lives in the same city where she was born. María Dolores has a farm where she produces white corn. She has worked on this farm, located in the community of Vilcabamba, since the year 1987. She also earns her living raising young animals like guinea pigs and hens. 

María Dolores needs the loan to purchase more young guinea pigs. She belongs to Asociación Arariwa's "Mamacha del Carmen" communal bank. The communal bank is in its third year of operation, and it is going very well for them. It is made up of people who are always looking for opportunities to get ahead and provide their children with a better future through their daily efforts. The members work in agriculture, artisanal crafts, food sales, ranching, raising young animals, and more. 

(The person who appears in the bottom of the photograph arrived late to the meeting.)

loans.use: to buy more young guinea pigs.

loans.name: Sen

texts.en:
Living in a wooden house located in the Borey Cholsa district of Takeo province, Sen is aged 31 years. She is married with two children, one of whom is in school, and another one is too young for school. In order to support the family, she has earned a living through farming rice for 18 years. With this current business, she and her husband can earn 50,000 KHR (Cambodian riels) per day.

This is the first micro loan for Sen with VisionFund. She wants to use her loan to buy fertilizer for her farmland. With this loan, she hopes to grow her rice and increase her current business to better her family’s living conditions.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer for her farmland

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy barbed wire, staples and posts to improve the fences

loans.name: Francisco De Jesús

texts.es:
Francisco de 38 años de edad, es un agricultor que estudio hasta cuarto  grado,  es acompañado la esposa se dedica a los oficios  domésticos, han procreado 2 hijos en esta relación,  lo cual uno de ellos están en la escuela.


Francisco se dedica a la agricultura desde que tenía 15 años de edad,  este trabajo se lo enseño el padre sabiendo que en un futuro le iba a servir este oficio; también trabaja como vigilante en un beneficio donde recogen el café esto también le genera ingresos a la familia,  esto lo hace desde tres años y decidió dedicarse a esto porque un amigo lo recomendó para trabajar ahí,  en un horario de 24 horas y 24 horas 	que descansa esos días que descansa trabaja la agricultura.

El préstamo que esta solicitando a CREDICAMPO, es para comprar 4 sacos de abono, para cultivar 14,000 metros cuadrados  de tierra y también comprara un litro de  herbicidas para matar la hierba mala que le afecta a los cultivos también buscara más personas que le ayuden al cultivo.  Esto le ayudara porque hoy con la ayuda de los préstamos podrán cultivar más y tener mejores ingresos.

Los sueños Francisco  es poder seguir cultivando y poder ayudarles a la  esposa a salir adelante y poder tener muchos ingresos para sacar adelante los hijos y que estudien.
texts.en:
Francisco is 38 years old and is a farmer. He studied up to Grade 4. He is married, his wife does domestic work and they have 2 children, both of whom are in school.

Francisco has been farming since he was 15 years old. His father taught him knowing that it would serve him as work in the future. He also works as a guard in a coffee processing plant and that also generates income for his family. He has been doing this for 3 years and he decided to do this as a friend recommended him to work there. He works 24 hours and rests 24 hours. The days he has off he work at his farming.

The loan he is requesting from CrediCampo is to buy 4 bags of fertilizer to cultivate 14,000 sq. meters of land. He will also buy a liter of herbicide to kill the weeds that harm his crops and also find people to help him with his growing. This will help him as with the support of the loans he can cultivate more and make more income. Francisco's dream is to continue farming and be able to help his wife get ahead and have lots of income to support his children and their studies.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer, herbicide and find people to help him farm his 14,000 square meters.

loans.name: Humbertina Yolanda

texts.es: Doña Humbertina, habita Junto a su familia en la ciudad de El Rama, tiene dos hijos el mayor casado e independiente y el menor a su cargo y le ayuda en las actividades del negocio después del estudio.  Humbertina se dedica desde hace mucho tiempo a la Venta de Carne asada exclusivamente de Pelibuey, le apoya en esta actividad su esposo ya que es el único medio de sobrevivir para ellos, necesita invertirle en la compra de Gaseosas, Jugos Pelibuey para ya que cuenta con mayor demanda pero no tiene el efectivo suficiente para esta inversión.  su mayor propósito es ver sus hijos realizados que dependar por si solos.
texts.en: Humbertina lives together with her family in the city of El Rama. She has two children, the eldest is married and independent. The youngest is dependent on her and helps her with her business after school. For a long time Humbertina has sold barbequed meat, specifically Pelibuey sheep. Her husband helps her in this work and it is their only source of income. She needs to invest in the purchase of soft drinks, juices and sheep as she now has greater demand and doesn't have enough money to make this investment. Her main goal is to see her children be able to support themselves.

loans.use: to buy products for her business like watermelon, sheep, juices, etc.

loans.name: Marlene

texts.es: La señora Marlene de 31 años de edad,  convive con el señor Víctor más de 11 años, ambos tienen 1 hijo dependiente y viven en la casa de  sus padres en Colomi. La señora y su esposo son personas trabajadoras y humildes, ella se dedica al comercio de venta de abarrotes en una tienda comercial en el mismo domicilio con atención diaria y el esposo realiza el servicio de amplificación para todo tipo de acontecimientos sociales, de esta forma ellos obtienen ingresos para vivir mejor,actualmente la señora solicita un crédito para capital de operación para la compra de mercadería para su tienda comercial ya que el dinero que tenía como ahorro lo invirtio en el mantenimiento de la amplificación, de esta forma podrá darle mejores condiciones de vida a su familia.
texts.en: Marlene, 31 years old, has lived with Victor for over 11 years and they have 1 dependent child and live in her parents' house in Colombi. Marlene and her partner are hardworking and humble people. She works selling groceries in a shop in their home that she attends to daily and her partner has a sound system service for all sorts of social events and with that they have income to live better. At the moment, Marlene requests a loan for operating capital to purchase merchandise for her shop so that the money she currently has saved can be invested in the maintenance of the sound system, and so she can provide better living conditions for her family.

loans.use: to buy merchandise for her shop

loans.name: Venera

texts.ru: Венера, 38 лет, замужем, мать 6 детей. У Венеры - среднее образование, в качестве основного дохода для своей семьи она занимается полеводством и животноводством, стартовав в 1998 году с 10,000 сом (KGS), благодаря целеустремленности и трудолюбию Венеры, на сегодняшний день у нее в хозяйстве есть: 1 дойная корова, 1 бычок, 1 лошадь, 2 козы и 5 овец. Также есть 1,45 ГА земельной доли, на которой она выращивает картофель для внутрихозяйственного потребления и реализации. Ежемесячный совокупный доход составляет около 18,000 сом (KGS). В целях дальнейшего развития своего хозяйства, Венера обратилась в Банк "Бай-Тушум" за кредитом в сумме 60,000 сом (KGS) для закупки семян картофеля элитных сортов и пшеницы для проведения весенне-полевых работ. Венера намерена получить хороший урожай со своего участка, что непременно приведет к увеличению капитала семьи. Доходы от кредита она планирует вложить в улучшение урожайности и качества почвы.
texts.en:
Venera is 38 years old, married and the mother of 6 children. Venera has secondary education. As a main source of income for the family, she works with field crop cultivation and livestock breeding, after having started in 1998 with 10,000 som (KGS). Thanks to Venera's purposefulness and hard work, she currently has a dairy cow, one bull-calf, one horse, two goats and five sheep at her farm. She also has 1.45 hectares of land, on which she grows potatoes for own use and sale. The total monthly income is around 18,000 som (KGS). 

With an aim to further develop her business, Venera turned to the bank "Bai Tushum" for a loan in the amount of 60,000 som (KGS) to purchase high quality potato and wheat seeds to carry out the spring work in the field. Venera intends to get a good harvest from her plot of land, which will lead to an increase in the family's capital. She plans to invest the income from the loan in improving the yield and quality of the soil.

loans.use: To buy high quality potato and wheat seeds

loans.name: Thy

texts.en:
Thy is aged 31 years and married with three children who are all dependent and in school. She lives in a rural village of Kampong Thom province’s Prasath Balang district. She and her husband earn a living through farming rice, which they have been doing for 13 years. They have also raised pigs for eight years and sold groceries for three years. With these businesses, they can earn about 50,000 KHR per day.

Thy has been with VisionFund for one cycle. She successfully used the previous loan to better support her family and increase her family’s business. Now she is applying for another loan. She wants to use her loan to buy fertilizer for her farmland and buy pig feed for her pig raising. She hopes to fatten her pigs and timely grow her rice.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer for her farmland

location.town: Kampong Thom Province, Prasat Balang district

loans.name: Isomiddin

texts.ru:
Исомиддин мужчина в возрасте 48 лет. Он со своей семьей проживает в сельской местности. У Исомиддин очень дружная семья, он многодетный отец. Имеет пятерых детей. У него среднее образование. Исомиддин с молодости трудился на поле, занимался животноводством и до сегодняшнего дня продолжает свою деятельность он разводит крупно рогатого ската и козла. В ухаживание скота Исомиддину помогает его жена Шохсанам. Благодаря животноводству жизнь Исомиддина и его семьи идет в лучшую сторону, потихоньку  Исомиддин купил себе участок  земли, чтоб построить не большой дом. Выдал дочку замуж.
Исомиддин недавно продал своего скота и теперь вместо одного он бы хотел приобрести двух скот и корм, но ему для покупки скота не хватает денежных средств. Поэтому Исомиддин подал заявку на кредит. Он очень надеется на поддержку Арванд и заранее  выражает свою благодарность.
texts.en:
Isomiddin is a man of the age of 48. He lives in a village together with his family. Isomoddin has a very friendly family, and he is the father of many children; he has five children. He has secondary education. Isomiddin has worked in the field since his childhood, with livestock breeding, and to this day he continues this activity. He breeds cattle and goats. Isomiddin's wife Shohsanam helps with looking after the cattle. 

Thanks to the livestock breeding, Isomiddin and his family's life has become better. Slowly, Isomiddin was able to purchase a plot of land in order to build a small house. He also married away his daughter. Isomiddin sold his cattle not long ago, and currently he would like to purchase not one but two heads of cattle and fodder. However he does not have enough money for purchasing the cattle. Therefore Isomiddin applied for a loan. He hopes very much for support from Arvand, and expresses his gratitude in advance.

loans.use: to purchase two heads of cattle and fodder

loans.name: Im

texts.en:
Originally from a rural village of the Prasat Balang district of Kampong Thom province, Im is 43 years old and married with two children who are dependent on her and still in school. She and her husband earn a living through farming rice, which they have been doing for five years. The current business earns their family about 20,000 KHR per day.
