This is the first loan cycle for Im with VisionFund. She will use her loan to buy fertilizer for her farmland. With this loan, she hopes to make more income to improve her family's standard of living and keep her children in school.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer for her farmland

location.town: Kampong Thom Province, Prasat Balang district

loans.name: Nafisa

texts.ru: Молодая энергичная Нафиса ещё не замужем. Ей 27 лет. Образование у нее среднее. Живет Нафиса с родителями и наравне с ними она зарабатывает на то , чтобы обустроить свою жизнь и создать необходимые условия для жизни. Она  выращивает крупный рогатый скот и от продажи молока и молочных изделий пополняет семейный бюджет. Нафиса положительная, трудолюбивая девушка. Нафиса хочет приобрести дополнительно теленка для того , чтобы увеличить доходность от выращивания скота, но средств у нее на приобретение теленка недостаточно. Нафиса уже брала кредит В "Арванд" у нее положительная кредитная история и она довольна тем, как обслуживают у нас,поэтому Нафиса повторно обратилась к нам за кредитом. Запрашиваемая сумма  будет ей достаточно , чтобы Нафиса смогла выполнить свою задумку и улучшить финансовое состояние семьи.
texts.en:
The young and energetic Nafisa is not yet married. She is 27 years old and has secondary education. Nafisa lives with her parents and together with them she earns money to build their lives and create the necessary conditions for living. Nafisa breeds cattle and contributes to the family budget through selling milk and dairy products. 

Nafisa is a positive and hardworking girl. She would like to purchase an additional calf in order to increase the income from breeding cattle, however she does not have enough money to purchase this calf. Nafisa already took a loan from "Arvand" and she has a positive credit history. She was pleased with the way "Arvand" serves the clients and therefore she again turned to "Arvand" for a loan. The loan amounts requested is enough for her to carry out her idea and improve the family's financial situation.

loans.use: to buy a calf

loans.name: Godelive

texts.en: Godelive is 47 years old. She sells utensils and has been in the business for the past 10 years. With the loan, she would like to buy more glasses and plastic items for sale. The profits from the business will be used to make more savings.

loans.use: to buy more glasses and plastic items for sale.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To purchase equipment for her business such as scissors and hair brushes.

loans.name: Bashir

texts.en: Bashir lives in the town of Masindi-Uganda. He practices farming located in a rural area plus produce to supplement his income. Bashir started the business so as to earn a living. He hopes to complete his residential house. Even though he faces a challenge of weather changes and high transportation costs, Bashir is a hardworking man who needs a loan to pay for weeding his garden.

loans.use: to pay for weeding his garden.

loans.name: Patrick

texts.en: Patrick is a forty-nine-year-old male. He sells general merchandise. His shop is located on a highway and gives him more salary for extra income. Patrick started his business so as earn an income and provide for his family. Patrick hopes to educate his children to a level of self sustainability despite the challenge of competition. Patrick intends to use the loan to buy sugar, soap, salt and cooking oil to sell.

loans.use: to buy sugar, soap, salt and cooking oil to sell.

loans.name: Ana Lucia

texts.es: A sus 60 años de edad Ana se dedica a la ganadería y a la agricultura,  ella reside en una comunidad donde las personas viven de estas dos actividades, Ana vive con su esposo y con una hija de 17 años que asiste al colegio, el crédito lo va a invertir en la compra de una vacona para incrementar a su negocio, su esposo se dedica a la agricultura y a la ganadería, dice que para cuidar a su ganado su rutina diaria es levantar a las 4 de la mañana para ordeñar sus vacas, lo que aspira  es que su negocio crezca para poder educar a su hija así como educo a su hijos mayores.
texts.en: At 60 years old, Ana works raising cattle and farming. She lives in a community where the people live on these two activities. Ana lives with her husband and a 17-year-old daughter who attends the secondary school. She will invest the loan in buying a cow in expand her business. Her husband works in farming and raising cattle. She says that in order to care for the cattle, her daily routine is to get up at 4 in the morning to milk the cows. What she wants is for her business to grow so that she can educate her daughter as she educated her older children.

loans.use: to purchase a cow

loans.name: Cristian Fabricio

texts.es: Cristian es un joven que nació en la ciudad pero que le gusta mucho ayudar o motivar a las personas a que cuiden la naturaleza y debido a esto él se fue a vivir al campo, Cristian se dedica a la agricultura de papas, zanahoria y otros productos, tiene un criadero de truchas (peces), también se dedica a trabajar por contratos a sembrar árboles, le gusta mucho poder dar trabajo a las personas que viven en el campo ya que les lleva a trabajar en sus sembríos  y en el cuidado de sus peces, ristian vive solo y le gustaría mejorar su negocio para comprarse una casa, y su mayor anhelo es que las personas no destruyan la naturaleza.
texts.en:
Cristian is a young man who was born in the city but who really likes to help and motivate people to take care of nature and, because of this, he went to live in the countryside. Cristian works farming potatoes, carrots and other crops, he has a trout (fish) farm, and also works by contract to plant trees. He really likes to be able to give work to the people who live in the countryside, so he brings them to work in his fields and to care for his fish. Cristian lives alone and would like to improve his business in order to buy a house for himself and his greatest wish is that people don't destroy the environment. 
.

loans.use: to purchase fertilizer and fungicide

loans.name: Muhayo

texts.en: Muhayo sews wonderful national Tajik women dresses. She is a 62-year-old woman who is married and has two children. Her husband is a kind man. He is a builder. Muhayo began her own business sewing national women's dresses 20 years ago. She has her own workshop in the center of her region. Thanks to her good service, she has managed to gain many customers. Since she’s had her business, her family’s quality of life has been improving. She has great experience in sewing. She wants to develop her business further but she needs to buy a new sewing machine. She is asking for a loan of 3,000 Somoni to buy a sewing machine to increase her working capital. She awaits your support.

loans.use: To a buy sewing machine

loans.name: Nubu

texts.en: Nubu lives in Kampala, Uganda. She is a single mother with three children, two of whom attend school. She is also looking after her mother. She has been selling second-hand clothes from the market for the last ten years, working seven days a week. She also sells vegetables and banana plantains as another source of income. She has requested a loan of 200,000 UGX from MCDT- SACCO to enable her to stock second-hand curtains, bed sheets and brassieres for sale. Her challenges include seasonality. Her dream is to build her own home for both residential and business purposes. She joined MCDT because of the relatively low loan interest charged.

loans.use: To buy more second-hand clothes.

loans.name: Ilan Antonio

texts.es: Ilan  de 32 años de edad, es una persona esforzada, con sacrificios ha logrado obtener su patrimonio, posee una finca con un pequeño inventario ganadero y su vivienda propia, depende de sus propios recursos procedente de la actividad ganadera, es soltero,  no tiene hijos, ayuda a su mamá con la alimentación y los gastos de ella, Ilan con lo poco que gana no es suficiente para cubrir los gastos que se le avecinan de mejorar la vivienda,que actualmente no cuenta con muchas condiciones por lo que es de suelo y tiene parte del Zing con agujeros que permiten que pase el agua cuando llueve y mas ahora que viene el invierno.  solicita este crédito para comprar cemento, arena, arenilla, Zing, entre otros materiales de construcción y así ponerle embaldosado en la sala y cambiar parte del techo a su humilde vivienda.  Su mayor propósito es gozar de una vivienda digna.
texts.en:
Ilan is 32 years old. He is a dedicated person; with sacrifice, he has succeeded in obtaining his assets. He owns his own house and a farm with a small inventory of cattle. He depends on his own resources coming from his cattle work. He is single and has no children. He helps his mother with food and her expenses. 

The little bit that he earns is not enough for Ilan to cover the upcoming expenses of improving his house; it is currently not in very good condition, as it is earthen and part of the corrugated metal has holes that let the water come in when it rains, and even more so now that winter is coming. 

He is requesting this loan to buy cement, sand, fine sand, corrugated metal sheeting, and other construction materials to put a tile floor in the living room and replace part of the roof of his modest house. His main intention is to enjoy a decent house.

loans.use: to purchase corrugated metal sheeting, roof beams, and other construction materials.

loans.name: Rona

texts.en:
Rona is 42 years old and married with one child who is in school. She is a very hard working entrepreneur. 

Rona has a food vending business in the Philippines. Rona requested a PHP 23,000 loan through NWTF in order to buy ingredients for her food business.

Rona has been in this business for 15 years. In the future, Rona would like to save enough money to expand her business and repair her family's home.

loans.use: to buy ingredients for her food business.

loans.name: Hasmik

texts.en:
Hasmik is 31 years old, and she lives in the Gegharkunik region in the village of Gagarin. She is married, and she is a mother of two children. Her husband works at the Sevan city police station. Hasmik never worked, and she has always been engaged in farming. In her farm, she takes care of two cows, three calves, three sheep, two lambs and 20 chickens. She does nearly everything about the farm alone, since her husband comes home very late from his work. She also organizes the sale of her farm products, such as milk, cheese, meat and eggs. 

Hasmik says that she could do even more and take care of more cattle, but despite her young age, she has been feeling very weak and unhealthy lately. She asks for this loan in order to take a medical examination in order to find out the problem that causes great hardships during her everyday work about her house and her farm.

loans.use: to take a medical examination in order to find out the problem that causes great hardships during her everyday work about her house and her farm

loans.name: Rustam

texts.ru:
Рустам очень добропорядочный, честный, воспитанный и добросовестный мужчина в возрасте 36 лет  живущий в сельской местности. Рустам женат и имеет 3 детей.  Рустам работает на поле по сезону  наемным рабочим и получает небольшую зарплату. Основным источником дохода  у Рустама является откорм и разведение скота. Жена Рустама домохозяйка, она  активно помогает мужу по хозяйству и присматривает за скотом.  Сам же Рустам каждый базарный день выводит скот на скотный ранок и продает а на вырученные деньги покупает молодой скот и откармливает их чтоб в дальнейшем продать. Рустам  не имеет достойного образования  чтоб работать  на соответствующей работе. Как и все жители сельских местностей финансовое положение у Рустама крайне тяжелое. Рустам хочет увеличить поголовье скота и расширить свой товарооборот.
 По словам Рустама он хочет обеспечить свою семью так чтоб они не знали нужды и дети получили достойное образование и стали специалистами своего дела. Рустам обратился в организацию Арванд за финансовой поддержкой в надежде получить ее. ОН хочет купить скот и увеличить поголовье скота.
 Рустам заранее благодарен таким организациям как  «АРВАНД» за помощь и поддержку малоимущим и бедным слоям населения, благодаря таким организациям люди могут повысить уровень своей жизни.
texts.en:
Rustam is a very respectable, honest, well-mannered and conscientious man of 36 who lives in the country. He is married and has three children. Rustam does seasonal agricultural work as a hired labourer and receives a small salary, but his primary source of income is fattening and reselling cattle. His wife is a homemaker who actively helps her husband around the household and takes care of the livestock. Rustam himself takes the cattle to the market and sells them, then uses the money he receives to buy young cattle and fatten them for further resale. He doesn't have enough education to get an adequate job. Like all rural residents, his financial situation is difficult, and he wants to increase his head count of livestock in order to increase his turnover.

Rustam says that he wants to take care of his family so that their needs are met and the children get a good education and become specialists in their fields. He has turned to Arvand for financial support in hope of achieving this. He wants to buy cattle and increase the number of livestock he has. He thanks organizations such as Arvand in advance for their help and support to poor people who have very little, as it is thanks to such organizations that people can improve their quality of life.

loans.use: to buy cattle

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To buy two desktop computers for his business

loans.name: Nil

texts.en:
Originally from a rural village of the Prasat Balang district of Kampong Thom province, Nil is 40 years old and married with two children who are dependent on her and still in school. She and her husband earn a living through farming rice, which they have been doing for 18 years, and they also have raised pigs for 10 years. These current businesses earn their family about 35,000 KHR (Cambodian riels) per day.

Nil has been with VisionFund for five loan cycles. She successfully used the previous loan to better support her family and increase her family’s business. Now she is applying for another loan. She wants to use her loan to buy fertilizer for her farmland and buy pig feeds for raising her pigs. She hopes to grow her rice successfully and increase her current business to better her family’s living conditions.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer for her farmland

location.town: Kampong Thom Province, Prasat Balang district

loans.name: Nornn

texts.en:
Originally from a rural village of the Prasat Balang district of Kampong Thom province, Nornn is 31 years old and married with two children who are dependent, but they are all too young for school. She and her husband earn a living through farming rice, which they have been doing for eight years, and sometimes, they also work as paid workers to add more income. These current businesses earn their family about 18,000 KHR (Cambodian riels) per day.

Nornn has been with VisionFund for two loan cycles. She successfully used the previous loan to better support her family and increase her family’s business. Now she is applying for another loan. She wants to use her loan to buy fertilizer for her farmland. She hopes to grow her rice successfully and increase her current business to better her family’s living conditions.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer for her farmland

location.town: Kampong Thom Province, Prasat Balang district

loans.name: Sam Em

texts.en:
Originally from a rural village of the Ro Veang district of Preah Vihea province, Sam Em is 33 years old and married with one child who is dependent, but she is too young for school. She and her husband earn a living through farming rice, which they have been doing for eight years, and selling groceries, which they have been doing for five years. These current businesses earn their family about 24,000 KHR (Cambodian riels) per day.

Nornn has been with VisionFund for her one loan cycle. She successfully used the previous loan to better support her family and increase her family’s business. Now she is applying for another loan. She wants to use her loan to buy fertilizer for her farmland. She hopes to grow her rice successfully and increase her current business to better her family’s living conditions.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer for her farmland

location.town: Preah Vihear Province, Ro Veang District

loans.name: Aliena

texts.en:
As the married mother of six children, Aliena works hard to support her family.

She has a fishing business in the Philippines, and also earns additional income from raising pigs. Aliena is borrowing PHP 15,000 through NWTF in order to buy fishing net and other equipment.

Aliena has been sustaining her business activities through her past 17 loans from NWTF and more recently, through Kiva. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream of saving enough money to expand her business and repair her family's home.

loans.use: to buy fishing net and other equipment.

loans.name: Jose Manuel

texts.es:
El señor José lleva con su negocio de salsamentaría alrededor de 20 años, ofreciendo diferentes productos de la canasta familiar, productos de aseo, entre otros.
Es un hombre muy reconocido en el sector por su amplia experiencia y amabilidad con sus clientes, pues siempre está dispuesto a atenderlos y ayudarlos en lo que necesiten.
Actualmente siente que su negocio necesita un pequeño impulso para no quedarse atrás ante su competencia, y es por esto que solicita un auxilio económico para comprar más variedad de productos alimenticios y para el hogar con los cuales podrá captar más clientes y aumentara significativamente sus ventas.
Todas sus fuerzas están dirigidas en el sostenimiento de su esposa y sus 3 hijos a los cuales desea brindarles una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
José has worked running his grocery store for about 20 years, offering different products for the family pantry, cleaning products, and other things.

He is very well known in the area for his wide experience and friendliness with his customers, since he is always ready to serve them and help them in what they need.

At the moment he feels that his business needs a small push in order not to be left behind by the competition, and so he is asking for a loan to purchase more variety in food products and household supplies to attract more customers and significantly increase his sales.

All of his efforts are directed to the sustenance of his wife and three children for whom he wants to offer a better quality of life.

loans.use: To purchase a variety of products for the family pantry, the home and cleaning.

loans.name: Sokhim

texts.en:
Sokhim is 32 years old and married. She lives with her family in a rural area located in the Boribo district of Kompong Chnang province. She has four dependent children to take care of and now they are in school in the local area. Farming is her family's primary source of income. With the current business, she can earn approximately 18,000 KHR per day.

This is Sokhim's fourth loan with Kiva field partner, VisionFund. Now she will apply for a new loan: she will use her portion to buy fertilizer for her farmland. She hopes to increase her current business so as to earn a larger income to make better a living and keep her children in school.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer for her farmland

loans.name: Sokhy

texts.en:
Sokhy is 44 years old and married. She lives with her family in a rural area located in the Boribo district of Kompong Chnang province. She has three dependent children to take care of and now they are in school in the local area. Farming is her family’s primary source of income, and raising pigs is the second source. With the current business, she can earn approximately 28,000 KHR per day.

This is Sokhy's seventh loan with Kiva field partner, VisionFund. Now she will apply for a new loan; she will use her portion to buy pig food and fertilizer for her farmland. She hopes to increase her current business so as to earn a larger income to make a better living and to keep her children in school.

loans.use: to buy pig food and fertilizer for her farmland

loans.name: Chanthorn

texts.en:
Chanthorn is 47 years old and a widow. She lives with her family in a rural area located in the Boribo district of Kompong Chnang province. She has two dependent children to take care of and now they are in school in local area. Farming is the primary source of her family’s income to make a living. With the current business, she can earn approximately 18,000 KHR per day.

This is the fourth loan for Chan with Kiva’s partner, VisionFund. Now she will apply for a new loan. She will use her portion to buy fertilizer for her farmland. She hopes to increase her current business to earn a larger income to make a better living and keep her children in school.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer for her farmland

loans.name: Lucila

texts.es: Lucila se siente agradecida por el apoyo brindado y desea continuar con la venta de productos de primera necesidad, ella es una persona responsable por ese motivo le invitaron a participar en el banco comunal “Camino al Progreso” y en esta oportunidad  requiere el préstamo para comprar sacos de arroz, sacos de azúcar, fideos y otras cosas más, ella agradece y valora el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas mensuales con mucha responsabilidad.
texts.en: Lucila is grateful for the support she has received and wishes to continue selling products for everyday use. She is a responsible person and for this reason was invited to participate in the communal bank "Camino al Progreso" (Road to Progress). At this time she requires the loan to purchase items such as bags of rice, sugar and pasta, among other things. She is grateful for and highly values the loan and promises to make her monthly payments responsibly.

loans.use: to purchase bags of rice, sugar, beans and pasta.

loans.name: Joyce

texts.en:
Joyce lives in Kampala. She is married with 1 child and she goes to school. She has additional family members. She operates a food stall at the market on a retail basis. She has been in this business for the last 3 years. She works six days a week. She has requested a loan of 200,000 UGX to buy green bananas, cassava and sweet potatoes. Her business challenges include the perishable nature of the products and seasonality.

Her goal and aspiration is to buy a plot of land. She lives in a rented house and the family has no access to electricity or piped water. Her major monthly expenses include rent and school fees.

loans.use: To buy more green bananas, cassava and sweet potatoes.

loans.name: Moses

texts.en: Moses, a 29-year-old male, used the previous loan to buy drinks such as sodas and beer before the Christmas season. He also practices farming to make ends meet. Moses started his business so as earn a living and hopes to be self-sustainable. However, he faces challenges like weather changes and monopoly buyers. Moses is a hardworking man who intends to use the loan for weeding his gardens.

loans.use: to weed his gardens.

loans.name: Juan Jose De La Cruz

texts.es:
Juan, desea continuar trabajando en la agricultura, como ya se acerca la temporada para sembrar opta por un nuevo crédito con el que comprara abono, plaguicidas, herbicidas, pagara mozos para la limpia del terreno, protegerá el cultivo de granos básicos.
Invirtió el crédito anterior en insumos agrícolas básicos que fueron necesarios para aumentar su producción, la economía familiar es más favorable, su familia mantiene el mismo núcleo, gozan de mejor alimentación, salud y vestuario.
texts.en:
Juan wants to continue working in agriculture and since it is soon planting season, he chooses to get a new loan with which to buy fertilizer, pesticide, herbicide, and pay workers to clear the land, and he will protect his crop of basic grains.

He invested the previous loan in basic agricultural supplies that were necessary to increase his production. His family economic situation is better. His family is still the same nuclear family, and they enjoy a better diet, health and clothing.

loans.use: to purchase fertilizer, pesticide, herbicide, and pay workers

loans.name: Santos Romero

texts.es:
Santos, está satisfecha con el servicio y facilidad de pago que PADECOMSM le brinda, se decidió por un nuevo crédito para invertirlo en la compra de maíz, cal, leña y bolsas, contara con la materia prima para elaborar la venta de tortillas.
Con el crédito anterior adquirió los materiales necesario que con los que se ha mantenido trabajando esté tiempo, sus ventas han aumentando, los clientes están más satisfechos, ha mejorado su condición económica.
texts.en:
Santos is satisfied with the service and ease of payments that PADECOMSM offers her, so she decided to take a new loan to invest in the purchase of corn, calcium hydroxide (lime), firewood, and bags, which she will use as raw materials to carry out the sale of tortillas.

With the previous loan, she got necessary material with which she has continued working for this time. Her sales have increased, her customers are more satisfied, and she has improved her economic situation.

loans.use: to purchase corn, calcium hydroxide (lime), firewood and bags

loans.name: Maria Carmela

texts.es:
Carmela, se encuentra sin materia prima para elaborar las diferentes piezas de loza, esto la lleva a decidirse por un nuevo crédito para invertirlo en la compra de nacazcol, arcilla, leña y barro crudo, le permitirá trabajar y entregar con puntualidad sus pedidos.
Con el préstamo anterior su producción aumento, elaboro otro tipo de piezas, sus clientes han aumentado, las ventas e ingresos han tenido una leve mejoría, su familia vive en mejores circunstancias y ha cancelado su deuda.
texts.en:
Carmela doesn’t have any supplies with which to make the different pieces of crockery and this has brought her to ask for a new loan to buy nacazcol, clay, firewood, and raw clay so she can deliver her orders on time.

The previous loan allowed her to increase her production and she made some different pieces.  Her customers have increased and her sales and income have improved.  Her family lives under better conditions and she has paid off the debt.

loans.use: to buy supplies.

loans.name: Keak

texts.en:
Keak is 26 years old and married. She lives with her family in a rural area located in the Chol Kiri district of Kompong Chnang province. She has two dependent children to take care of. Farming is her family's primary source of income and fishing is the secondary source. With the current business, she can earn approximately 11,000 KHR a day.

This is Keak's tenth loan with Kiva field partner, VisionFund. Now she will apply for a new loan; she will use her portion to buy gasoline and fertilizer for her farmland. She hopes to increase her current business so as to earn a larger income to make a better living and to keep her children in school.

loans.use: to buy fuel and fertilizer for her farmland

location.town: Kampong Chnang Province, Chol Kiri District

loans.name: Aracelis Del Carmen

texts.es:
Aracelis es una joven madre de un niño de 12 años que se ha convertido en el motor de su vida y su motivación diaria para trabajar e intentar salir adelante.
Ella trabaja vendiendo todo tipo de mercancía como ropa, accesorios, elementos para el hogar, entre otros, de manera ambulante por las calles de Montería, Córdoba.
Ella es una mujer dedicada, guerrera y muy emprendedora, con deseos de progreso y con una experiencia de 2 años que la respaldan.
Actualmente desea ampliar su negocio y generar más ingresos para su hijo, por ésta razón solicita un auxilio para comprar surtido de productos al por mayor, generando así mas utilidades.
Su principal dificultad es cargar sus productos en la espalda para poder venderlos pero aun así no se rinde y sigue con su trabajo con la esperanza de cumplir su sueño de tener un almacén y generar empleo.
texts.en:
Aracelis is a young mother of a 12-year-old son who has become the driving force of her life and her daily motivation to work and try to get ahead. 

She works selling all sorts of merchandise such as clothing, accessories, household products, among others, as a vendor in the streets of Montería, Córdoba. 

She is a dedicated woman who is a fighter and very enterprising, with the desire to progress and with 2 years of experience behind her.

At the moment, she wants to expand her business and generate more income for her son, and so she is requesting this loan to buy a variety of supplies and to generate more profits.

Her primary difficulty is carrying her products on her back in order to sell them, but even so she doesn't give up and continues with her work with the hope of achieving her dream of having a shop and creating jobs.

loans.use: to purchase household products, clothes and accessories in order to sell them.

loans.name: Rin

texts.en:
Originally from a rural village of the Kos Boribo district in Kompong Chnang province, Rin is a 53-year-old widow. Rice farming has been the main source and raising pigs has been the second source of her family’s income for 29 years. She can earn about 20,000 KHR per day to meet her family’s needs.

This is the third loan for Rin with Kiva’s partner, VisionFund. Now she will apply for a new loan. She will use her portion to buy pig feed and fertilizer for her farmland. She hopes to increase her current business to earn a larger income to make a better living and keep her children in school.

loans.use: to buy pig feed and fertilizer for her farmland

loans.name: Yom

texts.en:
Originally from a rural village of the Kos Boribo district of Kompong Chnang province, Yom is a 53-year-old widowed mother of one child who is dependent on her. Rice farming has been the main source of her family’s income for 33 years. She can earn about 16,000 KHR per day to meet her family’s needs.

This is the fourth loan for Yom with Kiva’s partner VisionFund. Now she will apply for a new loan, she will use her portion to buy fertilizer for her farmland. She hopes to increase her current business to earn a larger income to make a better living and keep her children in school.

Note: This picture is with her son.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer for her farmland

loans.name: Chan

texts.en:
Chan is 32 years old and married. She lives with her family in a rural area located in the Chol Kiri district of Kompong Chnang province. She has two dependent children to take care of. Farming is the family's primary source of income and fishing is the secondary source. With the current business, she can earn approximately 12,500 KHR a day.

Now she will apply for a new loan; she will use her portion to buy fuel and fertilizer for her farmland. This is Chan's fourth loan with Kiva field partner, VisionFund. She hopes to increase her current business so as to earn a larger income to make a better living and to keep her children in school.

loans.use: to buy fuel and fertilizer for her farmland

location.town: Kampong Chnang Province, Chol Kiri District

loans.name: Kheourn

texts.en:
Kheourn is 35 years old and married. She lives with her family in a rural area located in the Chol Kiri district of Kompong Chnang province. She has one dependent child to take care of. Farming is the family's primary source of income and fishing is the secondary source. With the current business, she can earn approximately 13,800 KHR a day.

Now she will apply for a new loan; she will use her portion to buy fuel and fertilizer for her farmland. This is Kheourn's sixth loan with Kiva field partner, VisionFund. She hopes to increase her current business so as to earn a larger income to make a better living and keep her children in school.

loans.use: to buy fuel and fertilizer for her farmland

location.town: Kampong Chnang Province, Chol Kiri District

loans.name: Dilber

texts.es:
Dilber, vive junto a sus padres los cuales ya son ancianos, actualmente está soltero, ya que se separo de su esposa sus hijos viven con ella, se dedica a la agricultura y ganadería, su negocio funciona desde hace tres años, se lo enseñó su papá. Por el momento no representa ningún problema en administrarlo.
Con el financiamiento comprara fertilizantes, abono, herbicidas, semilla y un ternero, ayudara a preparar el terreno para cultivar granos básicos y aumentara su ganado, espera tener una buena cosecha que le respalden los pagos de la deuda. 
Su sueño es mantenerse trabajando para ampliar su negocio, mejorar su situación económica para brindar a sus padres una vida más confortable y apoyar económicamente a sus hijos.
texts.en:
Dilber lives with his parents who are elderly. At the moment he is single, since he separated from his wife and his children live with her.  He works in agriculture and raising cattle, his business has been operating for three years and his father taught him how to do it. For now there aren't any problems in running it.

With the loan, he will buy natural and chemical fertilizers, herbicides, seeds, and a calf, which will help to prepare the land to plant basic grains and increase his herd.  He hopes to have a good harvest that will support his loan payments. 

His dream is to continue working to expand his business, improve his economic situation in order to provide his parents with a more comfortable life, and to economically support his children.

loans.use: to purchase natural and chemical fertilizers, herbicides, seeds, and a calf

loans.name: Isidro

texts.es:
Isidro, es acompañado, vive con su campanera de vida y dos hijas de 14 y 13 años de edad, se dedica a vender ropa para ambos sexos, niños y niñas,  lo realiza junto a su compañera de vida desde las seis de la mañana a las cuatro de la tarde, lo aprendió de su familia, su dificultad es el traslado de la mercadería en auto bus, su ventaja es la renovación de su inventario de manera inmediata para satisfacer los gustos de sus clientes.
Comprará blusas, trajes, pantalones, camisas, faldas, chores, ropa interior y otras prendas diversificadas en estilos, colores y tallas, fortalecerá su negocio lo suficiente para sobre salir ante la competencia.
Su sueño es mantener su negocio funcionando para ahorrar lo necesario y comprar su casa propia, cancelar la deuda adquirida y lo más importante ofrecer a su familia un mejor estilo de vida.
texts.en:
Isidro, pictured here, lives with his life partner and two daughters who are 14 and 13 years old. He sells clothing for both men and women, as well as for children. He and his wife do this work together, starting at 6 a.m. and working until 4 in the afternoon. He learned this trade from his family. 
His challenge is the commute by bus to the market; his advantage is being able to rapidly turn over his inventory to satisfy the tastes of his clients.
He will purchase blouses, suits, pants, shirts, skirts, shorts, underwear and other garments in a variety of styles, colors and sizes. This will reinforce his business enough to get ahead of the competition. Isidro's dream is to keep the business running in order to be able to save enough to purchase his own home, pay off the loan, and - most importantly - offer his family a better quality of life.

loans.use: to purchase a variety of clothing items.

loans.name: Lucio

texts.es:
Lucio, comenta que el impacto que tuvo el crédito anterior en su negocio ha sido positivo, ya que logro una cosecha abundante, ha  mejorado la alimentación de su familia y las ventas le han dado buenas ganancias.
En esta oportunidad el capital que está solicitando le servirá para comprar abono, herbicidas, plaguicidas, insecticidas y semilla, se limitara a comprar lo necesario para continuar cultivando granos básicos.
texts.en:
Lucio remarks that the impact of the previous loan has been positive. Since he achieved an abundant harvest, he has improved his family's food supply and the sales have yielded good profits.

This round of capital that he is requesting will be used to buy fertilizer, herbicides, pesticides, insecticides and seeds; he will limit himself to buying just the neccessary to continue sowing grain crops.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer, herbicides, pesticides, insecticides and seeds.

loans.name: Dolores Román

texts.es:
Dolores de 64 años de edad, es un agricultor que estudio sexto grado,  es casado la esposa se dedica a los oficios  domésticos,  ha procreado 6 hijos en esta relación,  los cuales todos están acompañados en hogares apartes él solo vive con la esposa.

Dolores se dedica a la agricultura desde que tenía 15 años de edad, su  horario de  trabajo es de las 6 am a las 11 am.

El préstamo que esta solicitando a CREDICAMPO, es para comprar 4 sacos de abono,  herbicidas para matar la hierba, pago a personas que le ayuden a preparar l atierra, para cultivar 7,000 metros cuadrados de maíz.  

Los sueños de  Dolores es poder seguir cultivando y poder ayudarle a la  esposa a salir adelante y poder tener una vejez muy buena que no les falte los alimentos al hogar.
texts.en:
Dolores, 64 years old, is a farmer who went to school until the sixth grade. He is married and his wife takes care of the household tasks. He has 6 children in this relationship, all of whom have partners and live is other homes. He lives alone with his wife.  

Dolores has worked in agriculture since he was 15 years old, and his work schedule is from 6am to 11am.

The loan that he is requesting from CREDICAMPO is to purchase 4 bags of fertilizer, herbicides to kill the weeds, and to pay the people who help him prepare the land, in order to plant 7,000 square meters of corn. 

Dolores's dreams are to continue farming and to be able to help his wife get ahead and to be able to have very good old age in which their home isn't lacking in food.

loans.use: to purchase 4 bags of fertilizer, herbicides to kill weeks, and pay the people who help him prepare the land, in order to plant 7,000 square meters of corn.

loans.name: Ren

texts.en:
Originally from a rural village of the Kos Boribo district of Kompong Chnang province, Ren is a 40-year-old, widowed mother of three children who are dependent on her. Now they study at the local area. Rice farming has been the main source of her family’s income. She can earn about 15,000 KHR per day to meet the family’s needs.

This is the third loan for Ren of Kiva’s partner, VisionFund. Now she will apply for a new loan; she will use her portion to buy fertilizer for her farmland. She hopes to increase her current business, so as to earn a larger income to make a living better and keep her children in school.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer for her farmland.

loans.name: Deysi

texts.es:
Deysi de 42 años de edad, estudio hasta sexto grado de nivel académico,  el esposo se dedica a la agricultura y son padres de 5 hijos de los cuales uno va a la escuela y los otros están en hogares apartes, con Deysi solo vive el esposo y una hija.

Deysi se dedica a la agricultura con el esposo desde hace ya 15 años, ella decidió ayudarle al esposo a trabajar a la agricultura para sacar adelante a los hijos y él fue quien le enseño el trabajo de la agricultura.

Deysi solo a esto se dedica el trabajo le queda a una distancia de 10 minutos,  ellos viajan a pie y en este trabajo lo hacen entre los dos el esposo y ella,  en ocasiones les ayudan los hijos en un horario de 6 am a las 11 am

El préstamo que está solicitando a CREDICAMPO,  es para comprar semilla, herbicidas y 6 sacos de abono.

Los sueños de ella son  seguir ayudándole al esposo sacando adelante a la hija que tienen en casa,  darle el estudio y que ella se prepare academicante para que sea una profesional en un futuro.
texts.en:
Deysi is 42 years old. She studied until sixth grade. Her husband works in agriculture, and they are the parents of 5 children. One goes to school and the others live in separate homes; only her husband and one daughter live with Deysi.

Deysi has worked in agriculture with her husband for 15 years. She decided to help her husband in agriculture in order to improve the lives of the children. It was he who taught her to farm.

Deysi’s only job is agriculture. It takes 10 minutes to get to work travelling on foot. She and her husband work together. Occasionally the children help them from 6 am to 11 am.

The loan she requests from CrediCampo is to buy seeds, herbicide, and 6 sacks of fertilizer.

Her dreams are to continue helping her husband and providing for the daughter who lives at home, so that she gets an education and is academically prepared for a career in the future.

loans.use: to buy seeds, herbicides, and 6 sacks of fertilizer.

loans.name: Yesu Mo Group

texts.en:
The group is made up of two working members, represented by Mary.

Mary is 57 years old and married. She has one dependant child and she makes a living selling cooking utensils door-to-door. She does not have the help of anyone else in her business; she deals with buying the cooking utensils and then selling them to her customers, which is why she needs the loan to buy more of the cooking utensils. 

The other member is Augustina, who is 32 years old and sells assorted soaps door-to-door.

loans.use: To buy cooking utensils and then sell them to her customers.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to build his house.

loans.name: Martin

texts.es:
Martin, nos cuenta que con la ayuda del préstamo anterior compro los insumos agrícolas con los que protegió sus cultivos de granos básicos, tuvo suficiente producto para el consumo familiar y para vender otra parte.
Opta por un nuevo financiamiento en esta temporada que es el tiempo justo para sembrar granos básicos, comprara insumos agrícolas y pagara mozos para limpiar el terreno de la maleza.
texts.en: Martin tells us that, with the help of the last loan, he purchased agricultural supplies which protected his crops, which are basic grains. He had enough produce to feed his family and to sell. He opted for a new loan this season because it's the right time to sew his crops. He will purchase agricultural supplies and pay laborers to clear weeds from the land.

loans.use: to purchase agricultural supplies and pay laborers.

loans.name: Leang

texts.en:
Originally from a rural village of the Prasat Balang district of Kompong Thom province, Leang is a 38-year-old married mother of two children. They are dependent on her and study in the local area. Rice farming is the main source of her family’s income. She can earn about 18,500 KHR per day to meet the family’s needs.

This is the seventh loan for Leang from Kiva’s partner, VisionFund. Now she will apply for a new loan. She will use her portion to buy fertilizer for her farmland. She hopes to increase her current business so as to earn a larger income to make a better living and keep her children in school.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer for her farmland.

location.town: Kampong Thom Province, Prasat Balang district

loans.name: Yath

texts.en:
Yath is 48 years old and married. She lives with her family in a rural area located in the Prasat Balang district of Kompong Thom province. She has one dependent child to take care of and now he is in school in the local area. Farming is the primary source  of income and potato farming is the second source of her family’s income. With the current business, she can earn approximately 24,000 KHR per day.

This is the ninth loan for Yath from Kiva’s partner, VisionFund. Now she will apply for a new loan. She will use her portion to buy fertilizer for her farmland. She hopes to increase her current business so as to earn a larger income to make a better living and keep her children in school.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer for her farmland.

location.town: Kampong Thom Province, Prasat Balang district

loans.name: Lorn

texts.en:
Originally from a rural village of the Prasat Balang district of Kompong Thom province, Lorn is a 28-year-old, married mother of two children who are dependent on her. Now they study at the local area. Rice farming has been the main source and potato farming is the second source of her family’s income. She can earn about 35,400 KHR per day to meet the family’s needs.

This is the tenth loan for Lorn with Kiva’s partner, VisionFund. Now she will apply for a new loan; she will use her portion to buy fertilizer for her farmland. She hopes to increase her current business, so as to earn a larger income to make a living better and keep her children in school.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer for her farmland.

location.town: Kampong Thom Province, Prasat Balang district

loans.name: Yeth

texts.en:
Originally from a rural village of the Prasat Balang district of Kompong Thom province, Yeth is a 55-year-old married woman. Rice farming is the main source of her family’s income. She can earn about 29,800 KHR per day to meet family’s needs.

This is the ninth loan for Yeth from Kiva’s partner, VisionFund. Now she will apply for a new loan. She will use her portion to buy fertilizer for her farmland. She hopes to increase her current business so as to earn a larger income to make a better living and keep her children in school.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer for her farmland.

location.town: Kampong Thom Province, Prasat Balang district

loans.name: Sandra Cecilia

texts.es: Sandra es madre soltera, vive con su hijo de 7 años que asiste a la escuela, Sandra vive con su hijo en una casa por la que paga arriendo y se encuentra alado del colegio de su localidad y por este motivo hace  dos años emprendió un negocio donde tiene cabinas para llamadas telefónicas y  saca copias, Sandra comenta que va a invertir el crédito en la compra de una computadora para brindar el servicio de internet ya que los estudiantes le solicitan este servicio, Sandra aspira adecuar su negocio, ofrecer más variedad de servicios para mejorar sus ingresos y  darle una buena educación a sus hijo.
texts.en:
Sandra is a single mother. She lives with her 7-year-old son who attends school. Sandra lives with her son in a house that she rents. 

Sandra's house is located next to the local secondary school, so two years ago, she started a business in which she makes photocopies and has booths for making telephone calls. Sandra states that she is going to invest the loan in the purchase of a computer to provide internet service, since the students are asking her for that service. 

Sandra aspires to adapt her business and to offer more variety of services in order to improve her income and give her son a good education.

loans.use: to buy a computer

loans.name: Thy

texts.en:
Thy is 30 years old and married. She lives with her family in a rural area located in the Prasat Balang district of Kompong Thom province. She has two dependent children to take care of and now they are in school in the local area. Working is the primary source of income and raising pigs is the second source of her family’s income. With the current business, she can earn approximately 20,500 KHR per day.

This is the seventh loan for Thy from Kiva’s partner, VisionFund. Now she will apply for a new loan. She will use her portion to buy more pigs to raise. She hopes to increase her current business so as to earn a larger income to make a better living and keep her children in school.

loans.use: to buy more pigs to raise.

location.town: Kampong Thom Province, Prasat Balang district

loans.name: Martina

texts.es: Martina se dedica a la venta de productos de primera necesidad, ella es una persona responsable por ese motivo le invitaron a participar en el banco comunal “Camino al Progreso” y en esta oportunidad  requiere el préstamo para comprar sacos de arroz, sacos de azúcar, fideos, leche y otras cosas más, ella agradece y valora el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas mensuales con mucha responsabilidad.
texts.en:
Martina sells products of primary necessity in her grocery store. She is a responsible person.  For that reason, she invites you to participate in the "Road to Progress" Communal Bank.  On this opportunity, she needs a loan to purchase sacks of rice, sacks of sugar, beans, milk and other iems of merchandise.

Martina is grateful for and values this loan and promises to comply very responsibly with her monthly payments as scheduled.

loans.use: to buy sacks of rice, sacks of sugar, beans, milk and other items for her grocery store.

loans.name: Farhad

texts.en:
Farhad is a 27-year-old master craftsman. He is married and has a child aged three. Farhad is an IDP (Internally Displaced Persons) from Lachin city and now he is living in Baku region with his lovely wife and a child. His wife doesn't work in the business, therefore all the needs of the family are provided by Farhad and he wants to increase his business. 

It’s noted that he is a master craftsman and that he builds stone walls. He has been in this business for 2 years. Today Farhad needs a loan of an amount of 1,000 AZN (Azerbaijan New Manat) to buy new materials to support his new business. He is thankful to the Kiva organization and all lenders for their help. In the future Farhad wants to hire an assistant for his business.

loans.use: to buy new materials to support his new business.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase more used clothes for her business.

loans.name: Anahit

texts.en: Anahit lives in the village Gagarin in Gegharkunik region. She has nice farm and takes care of it with great pleasure. In this occupation she is not alone.  She runs the farm with the help of her husband. In her farm she has two cows, three calves, two pigs, two piglets and 15 chickens. In fact, her farm products that she sells are not a lot, but it helps this couple to sustain their family’s needs. Anahit’s children (2 daughters and a son) also help their parents, and little by little, they are also becoming aware of farming skills and details. As Anahit says, a larger farm will improve their financial problems, and provide her children with better living conditions, so she has plans to enlarge the number of her farm cattle. She asks for this loan in order to buy a heifer and a lot of animal fodder for farming cattle.

loans.use: to buy a heifer and a lot of animal fodder for farming cattle.

loans.name: Yorn

texts.en:
Originally from a rural village of the Ponhea Leur district of Kandal province, Yorn is a 34-year-old widow. She has one dependent child. Rice farming is the main source of her family’s income. She can earn about 30,500 KHR per day to meet her family’s needs.

This is the third loan for Yorn from Kiva’s partner, VisionFund. Now she will apply for a new loan. She will use her portion to buy fertilizer for her farmland. She hopes to increase her current business so as to earn a larger income to make a better living and keep her children in school.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer for her farmland.

loans.name: Elemawushie Group

texts.en:
Meet the members of the “Elemawushie” group from Dansoman-Accra, a city in Greater-Accra region, Ghana. They are all local entrepreneurs who have come to the micro finance institution, a partner of Kiva, to apply for a total loan amount of GHS 1,400. With the help of this loan they will be able to expand their individual businesses, make more sales and consequently improve their living conditions. 

They are involved in making a local drink called 'pito' and kenkey (cooked corn paste) and fish. Ama is the featured borrower of this group. The 42-year-old is married and has no children. Ama has sold 'Pito' for 20 years now. With her share of this loan, she is going to buy millet and firewood to prepare 'Pito' to sell to customers. This will help her improve the business and family life.

loans.use: To buy millet and firewood to prepare 'Pito' to sell to customers.

loans.name: Dien

texts.en:
Residing in the Kulen district of Preah Vihea province, Dien is now 43 years old. He is married and has two children. In order to support the family, he has been growing paddy rice for ten years. This business helps him earn 9,000 KHR on average per day.

In order to expand his current business, he is now requesting his first loan with VisionFund. With the amount of money, he will purchase fertilizer and seed for his paddy rice farm. 

He expects that the income will help him to expand his business and improve his family’s living.

loans.use: to purchase fertilizer and seed for his farmland.

loans.name: Antonio

texts.es: Antonio se dedica  a la agricultura, él es una persona responsable por ese motivo le invitaron a participar en el banco comunal “Camino al Progreso” y en esta oportunidad  requiere el préstamo para comprar fertilizantes, él agradece y valora el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas mensuales con mucha responsabilidad.
texts.en: Antonio works in agriculture. He is a responsible person, so he was invited to join the “Camino al Progreso” communal bank. At this time he needs a loan to buy fertilizer. He is grateful for and values the loan, and promises to make his monthly payments responsibly.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer.

loans.name: Erlinda

texts.en:
Erlinda is 41 years old and married with six children. Four of her children are in school. She is a very hardworking entrepreneur. 

Erlinda has a fishing business in the Philippines. She has been in this business for twenty-one years. She requested a PHP 20,000 loan amount through NWTF in order to buy fishing gear and other equipment.

In the future, Erlinda would like to save enough money to expand her business and continue to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy fishing gear and other equipment.

loans.name: Fredy Armando

texts.es:
Fredy de 67 años de edad,  estudio hasta bachillerato, opción contador, está casado su esposa se dedica a los oficios domésticos, actualmente tiene dos hijos que ya trabajan generan ingresos para ayudarle a él con los gastos de la casa, él vive con su esposa, sus dos hijos y su suegra, pero de él dependen dos.


Fredy tiene una pequeña tienda de venta de sodas, pan, azúcar, churros y otros tipos de artículos de tienda, antes él trabajaba en una tienda como vendedor,  pero hoy que ya tiene su propia tienda dice que le produce mejores ganancias y esta tiendita él la tiene en su casa;  su esposa le ayuda a él a vender y además ella hace ventas de tamales, atolitos de elote y así le ayuda con los gastos de la casa ya que sus hijos trabajan; pero es poco lo que ganan, él tiene la tienda abierta desde las 5.30 am hasta las 7pm, para no dejar de vender.


El préstamo que esta esta solicitando a CREDICAMPO,  es para comprar azúcar por mayor, sal, jugos, gaseosas, frijol, pan y de todo un poco, él realizo un balance de cuanto necesita y dice que si le aprueban el crédito  podrá cubrir esta necesidad.

Sus sueños son poder tener una tienda con variedad de productos,  para que los clientes no salgan más lejos a comprar,  ya que hay cosas que él no tiene en su tienda y los clientes le solicitan bastante. Así que pide a Dios le de salud para producir más en su negocio y obtener mejores ganancias.
texts.en:
Fredy, age 67, has a degree in accounting.  He is married, and his wife devotes herself to the domestic chores.  He has two children who now work and generate income in order to help him with the household expenses.  He lives with his wife, his two children, and his mother-in-law.  However, he only has two dependents.

Fredy has a small store where he sells sodas, bread, sugar, churros, and other items.  He previously worked as a salesman in a store.  However, he now has his own store.  He says that it produces better earnings for him.  He has this small store at his house.  His wife helps him sell.  She also sells tamales and corn-based drinks.  This way she helps him with the household expenses.  His children work, but they earn little.  His store is open from 5:30 a.m. until 7:00 p.m. so that he does not miss a sale.

The loan that he is requesting from CrediCampo is to buy sugar wholesale, salt, juices, soft drinks, beans, bread, and a little bit of everything.  He took stock of how much he needs, and he says that if the loan is approved he will be able to cover this need.

His dream is to be able to have a store with a variety of products so that his customers do not go farther away to make their purchases.  There are things that he does not have in his store that the customers request a lot.  He asks that God gives him good health so that he can produce more in his business and get better earnings.

loans.use: to stock his store.

loans.name: Alus

texts.en: Alus is a 44-year-old married woman. She has been running a school for many years with her husband (also shown in the photo). They have gained a good number of students and are very respected in their community. Alus, along with her husband, is contributing much to the family income through all of her great efforts. In order to accommodate more students in their school, Alus has requested a loan of 45,000 PKR to purchase couple of benches and chairs, along with new blackboards. Alus expects more admissions as their school becomes famous in their town. She wants to spend part of the revenue on the expansion of the school.

loans.use: to purchase a couple of benches and chairs, along with new blackboards.

loans.name: Manzooran

texts.en: Manzooran is a 50-year-old married woman. She has been running a business selling milk with her husband for many years. She has two buffaloes, which she uses for milk, selling to the people of her locality. She also sells butter and cheese to generate an extra amount of profit.  Manzooran has become famous for providing good quality milk and makes enough to contribute to her family's income. She has gradually improved her business with the support of the Kashf Foundation. Currently she is in her seventh loan cycle and has applied for a loan of PKR 60,000. This will allow her to purchase one more cow. Manzooran is hopeful that this loan will bring positive changes to her business.

loans.use: to purchase one more cow.

loans.name: Yan

texts.en:
Yan lives in Kulen district of Preah Vihea province. She is a 51-year-old widow woman who depends on agriculture for her living. She supports her living with a paddy rice farm and raising pigs. These two businesses help her earn 15,000 KHR on average per day.

She has already completed two loans with VisionFund, which helped her improve her living. She is now requesting another loan in order to pay for the paddy rice worker. 

She expects that the income will help her expand her business and improve her living, especially for nutritious food and health care.

loans.use: to pay for the paddy rice worker.

loans.name: Gul  Naz

texts.en: Gul Naz is a 33-year-old married woman, and a mother of seven children. The income generated by her husband is insufficient to cover all household expenses, so she initiated her business of milk sales. She has been doing it for many years and has become famous for providing good quality milk in her locality. With the support of Kashf Foundation, she has gradually improved her business; currently she requests a loan of 50,000 PKR to purchase another buffalo. This will help her to increase her sales, which will ultimately help in generating more income for her.

loans.use: to purchase another buffalo.

loans.name: Praxide

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “TRABAJADORAS DE HABASPATA”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Vilcabamba, perteneciente a la provincia de La Convencion y departamento de Cusco.

La socia Praxide se dedica al negocio de venta de frutas y verduras, la socia lleva a diferentes lugares, la socia vende platanos, naranjas y mandarinas y también vende cebollas, tomates y zapallos, la socia ya tiene varios años en este negocio y le va muy bien, el sueño de la socia es tener un local donde pueda vender las frutas y verduras. La socia solicita el crédito para comprar naranjas, plátanos y uvas y compara verduras como cebollas, zanahorias y tomates. 

La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
Praxide belongs to the “Workers of Habaspata” Communal Bank, located in the Vilcabamba district of La Convencion Province, Cusco Department.

Praxide sells fruits and vegetables. She goes to different locations and sells bananas, oranges, and mandarins. In addition, she offers onions, tomatoes, and squash. She has spent several years in the business and it is going well.

Praxide's dream is to have a fixed post where she can sell fruits and vegetables. She is requesting a loan to buy oranges, bananas, and grapes, plus vegetables such as onions, carrots and tomatoes.

Praxide is happy with the loan and promises to comply with her schedule of payments.

loans.use: to buy oranges, bananas, and grapes, and vegetables such as onions, carrots, and tomatoes to sell.

loans.name: Albertina

texts.es: Albertina es profesora y trabaja en uno de los colegios de la ciudad de Paucartambo, ella es una persona responsable por ese motivo le invitaron a participar en el banco comunal “Camino al Progreso” y en esta oportunidad  requiere el préstamo para uso personal como para pagar la educación de sus hijos, ella agradece y valora el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas mensuales con mucha responsabilidad.
texts.en: Albertina is a teacher who works in one of the secondary schools in the city of Paucartambo. She is a responsible person, which is why she was invited to join the “Camino al Progreso” (Path to Progress) communal bank. At this time she needs a loan for personal use to pay for her children’s education. She appreciates and values the loan, and promises to make her monthly payments responsibly.

loans.use: to pay for her children's education

loans.name: Marta Iluminidad

texts.es: Marta tiene 32 años de edad y habita en casa propia junto a su compañero de vida y sus tres hijos de 12 años, 8 años y 6 años de edad. Marta se dedica a la prestación de servicios domésticos desde hace 4 años y de esta forma se gana la vida y junto a su compañero de vida  mantienen la economía del hogar. Marta solicita este crédito a FUSAI puesto que desea terminar de construir un muro de contención para el cual necesita comprar materiales como: cemento, arena, ladrillo y hierro.
texts.en:
Marta, age 32, lives in her own house with her life partner and their three children.  The children are 12, 8, and 6 years old.  Marta has been providing domestic services for four years.  This way she earns a living.  Together with her life partner they keep the household finances going.

Marta is requesting this loan from FUSAI because she wishes to finish building a retaining wall.  In order to do so she needs to buy materials like cement, sand, bricks, and iron.

loans.use: to buy materials like cement, sand, bricks, and iron in order to build a retaining wall.

loans.name: Happy Ayllu Group

texts.es:
Los socios pertenecen al banco comunal “HAPPY AYLLU”; Este banco se ubicada en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Katia ella es soltera y tiene 29 años y tiene 1 hijo; La socia trabaja en su negocio de venta de ropa, la socia vende chompas, pantalones, polos, medias entre otras ropas, la socia trabaja desde las 8:00 a.m hasta las 7:00 p.m llevando a diferentes lugares como instituciones o sus amigos, la socia ya tiene 8 años en este negocio y le va muy bien, el sueño de la socia es tener una tienda donde pueda vender la ropa. La socia solicita el crédito para comprar chompas, medias, polos pantalones y casacas.

Los socios que están pegados a la foto grupal se les tomo la foto después de la reunión porque pidieron permiso por motivos de trabajo.
 
Los otros socios se dedican al negocio de venta de ropa, negocio de venta de sabanas, negocio de tienda de abarrotes y negocio de venta de productos de belleza.
 
 


La socia agradece a quienes forman parte de este sueño mediante este medio y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el plazo establecido.
texts.en:
The members belong to Happy Ayllu Communal Bank, located in the district of Cusco in the province of Cusco and department of Cusco.

The member is Katia.  She is 29 years old, single, and has one child.  She works in her business of selling clothes.  She sells sweaters, pants, polo style shirts, and socks, among other types of clothes.  She works from 8:00 a.m. until 7:00 p.m.  She takes her clothes to different places like to institutions or to her friends.  She has been in this business for eight years, and it is going very well for her.  Her dream is to have a store where she would be able to sell the clothes.  She is requesting the loan to buy sweaters, socks, polo style shirts, pants, and jackets.

The members whose photo is inset to the side of the group photo had their photo taken after the meeting.  This is because they requested permission to do so because of work.

The other members sell clothes, sell sheets, have a grocery store, and sell beauty products.

The member is grateful for those who form part of this dream in this way.  She pledges to make her payments according to the established time frame.

loans.use: to buy clothes.

loans.name: Luz Elena

texts.es:
Luz, es casada, vive junto a su esposo y siete hijos, todos aportan un poco para sobrellevar los gastos familiares, ella se dedica a elaborar petates para vender por mayoreo y al detalle, lo realiza desde hace 25 años, nace por la necesidad de ofrecer una vida digna a su familia, el oficio lo aprendió de su mamá.
Para aprovechar la temporada de la materia prima solicita el un préstamo con el que comprara tule por mayor, así pagara menos por su compra y sus ganancias serán mejores, permitiéndole trabajar por un tiempo y cumplir con los diferentes pedidos de sus clientes.
Su sueño es seguir fortaleciendo el negocio para obtener los ingresos necesarios con los que cumplirá con todos sus compromisos económicos y familaires.
texts.en:
Luz is married and lives with her husband and their seven children.  All of them contribute a little in order to cover the family expenses.  She makes bedrolls to sell wholesale and retail.  She has been doing this for 25 years.  The business was born from the necessity of providing her family with a decent life.  She learned this trade from her mother.

In order to take advantage of the season for the raw materials, she is requesting a loan.  She will use the loan to buy tulle wholesale.  This way she will pay less for her purchase, and her profits will be better.  This will allow her to work for a time and to fill her different customer orders.

Her dream is to continue strengthening the business in order to get the needed income to fulfill all of her familial and financial commitments.

loans.use: to buy tulle wholesale.

loans.name: Clori

texts.es:
Clori de 37 años de edad, es una señora que estuvo acompañada hace un tiempo, pero por problemas personales se decidió separar de su pareja, ella estudio hasta cuarto grado, es madre soltera desde hace doce años, tiene dos hijos, ambos van a la escuela, ella y sus hijos viven con el padre de Clori.

Ella se dedica a vender tostadas de plátano y de yuca desde hace cuatro años, ella anda en los buces vendiendo de lunes a domingo, se le pregunta porque no descansa y ella responde que si un día no va a vender ese día no gana nada y le hace falta ese dinero para sacar adelante a sus hijos y ayudarle con los gastos de la casa de su padre.  Ella antes se dedicaba a la agricultura pero un tiempo después dice que se le genera más fácil y con más ingresos para su hogar, a ella le queda a una distancia de  unos diez minutos y viaja en autobús,  sus horarios son todo el día hasta que se le hacen las 5 de la tarde.
     
El préstamo que esta solicitando a CREDICAMPO,  es para invertirle más a su negocio de venta de tostadas, y para ver si puede invertirle más a una pequeña tienda  que tiene de venta de sodas, churros, azúcar, etc. con este préstamo ella podrá mejor sus negocios y los ingresos serán más beneficiosos.
texts.en:
Clori, 37 years old, is a woman had a partner for a time, but because of personal problems she decided to part from her partner. She went to school up to the fourth grade, and has been a single mother for 12 years. She has two children who both go to school, and they all live with Clori's father.

She has been making a living from the sale of banana and cassava tostadas for the last four years. She sells in buses from Monday till Sunday. When people ask her why she does not rest, she replies that if one day she does not go selling, she does not earn anything, and she needs that money to get her children ahead and help her father with the home expenses. She worked in agriculture before, but she says that later saw that she earns more and more easily in this manner. She works 10 minutes by bus from her home. She works all day until 5 in the afternoon.

The loan she is requesting from CREDICAMPO is meant to invest in her business selling tostadas, and to see if she can also invest in a small shop selling soft drinks, churros, sugar, etc. With this loan she will be able to improve her businesses and her income will bring greater benefits to her.

loans.use: to invest in her business selling tostadas, and to see if she can also invest in a small shop selling soft drinks, churros, sugar, etc.

loans.name: Elba Claudia

texts.es:
Elba de 37 años de edad, estudio hasta octavo grado, está acompañada, su pareja trabaja en la agricultura, tienen dos hijos los cuales viven con ellos, ambos se dedican a la agricultura y su hijo mayor es quien motiva a ellos a producir en la agricultura, en casa viven cuatro pero de Elba solo dependen dos.

Ella se dedica a la agricultura y es ama de casa a la vez, la agricultura más que todo la trabaja con su hijo mayor que tiene quince años de edad, ya tiene cinco años de dedicarse a la agricultura, este negocio ella lo aprendió de sus padres, dice que ella cuando los padres se iban a la milpa ellos la llevaban a ella y le decían hija cuando seas grande debes aprender a hacer de todo para que ganes tu comida. De esa manera, ella fue aprendiendo y junto con su esposo y su hijo mayor ha decidido desde hace cinco años a la siembra del maíz y frijol. Sus horarios son de 6:00 am a 12:00 md.

El préstamo que está solicitando es para comprar abono,  insecticidas,  para sembrar lo suficiente y para en diciembre sacar algo para comprar sus estrenos y que no les falte la tortillita y los frijoles.

Los sueños que tiene son poder crecer siempre en la agricultura, obtener  mejores ingresos, con lo que se da a conocer con su comercio cada vez más, el préstamo le ayudara en su hogar ya que podrán comprar los insumos y a sembrar para en diciembre recoger las cosechas que son el sustento para el año.
texts.en:
Elba, 37 years old, went to school up to the eight grade. She has a partner who works in agriculture. They have two children who live with them and also work in agriculture. Her elder son is who motivates them to produce. Four people live in her home, but only two depend from Elba.

She makes a living from agriculture and is also a housewife. Her elder son, now 15, is the one who works hardest on the fields. She has been making a living from agriculture for 5 years now. It is something she learnt from her parents. When she was young her parents took her to the fields and told her that when she grew up she must learn to do everything so that she will be able to grow her food. In this manner she learned, and together with her husband and elder son, she has decided to plant corn and beans for the last 5 years. She works from 6:00 a.m. till 12:00 midday.

She is requesting a loan to buy manure, insecticides, and to plant enough so that in december she can harvest enough so that they have enough tortillas and beans

Her dreams are to continue growing her agriculture business, to improve her income, and to making her business more well known. The loan will help her with her home, since they will be able to buy the supplies and plant, so that in december they can harvest the crops that will sustain them throughout the year.

loans.use: to buy manure, insecticides, and to plant enough so that in december she can harvest enough so that they have enough tortillas and beans

loans.name: Vicent

texts.en: Vicent, who is cattle trader in Kyenjojo, is a 33-year-old married man, with seven children. He derives additional income from commercial farming. He experiences hardships due to inadequate capital and high costs of living. His vision is to open a slaughterhouse and educate his children. Vicent needs the loan to buy cattle for selling.

loans.use: to buy cattle for selling.

loans.name: Eath

texts.en:
Eath lives in Kulen district of Preah Vihea province. She is now 39 years old and married. Her living on working the paddy rice farm which helps her earn 11,300 KHR, average per day.

She is now requesting her first loan with VisionFund to pay for labor fees. She expects that the income will help her expand her business and cover the expense of her health care and food.

loans.use: to pay for labor fees

loans.name: Rabia

texts.en:
Rabia is a 24-year-old unmarried lady. Some years ago, she started doing hand embroidery with her mother. Her designs are much in demand and she has managed to consolidate a clientele that allows her to contribute to the expenses of her home. 

Her father’s income is not sufficient to meet their household expenses. She is the best earning resource in her household.  To help her to continue her operations, she has requested a loan of 40,000 PKR to buy spools of threads in different colors and packs of beads, sequins, and stones for its embellishment. In this way she would be able to cater to more customers consistently. 

She hopes to get increase in her income by targeting more customers.

loans.use: to buy spools of threads in different colors and packs of beads, sequins, and stones.

loans.name: Noeung

texts.en:
Neoung lives in Kulen district of Preah Vihea province. She is now 33 years old. She is married and has two daughters who are both in school. She and her family depend on agriculture to support their living. She and her husband do paddy rice and raise pigs. These help them earn 14,800 KHR on average per day.

She has already completed one loan with VisionFund, and could see the good impact on her family with the previous loan. She is now requesting a new loan in order to expand her business. She will use the money to pay for labor fees in farming rice. She expects that the income will help her to expand her business and help with her children's education, family's food and health care expenses.

loans.use: to pay for labor fees in farming rice.

loans.name: Zuhro

texts.ru:
Зухро опытный пекарь, проживающий в районе А.Джоми Хатлонской области. Ее деятельность востребованная, так как она печет традиционные таджикские лепешки для продажи. Лепешки являются главным угощением на столе каждой таджикской семьи. 
Зухро занимается выпечкой уже на протяжении более 15 лет и ее пекарня славится вкусными лепешками. Кроме нее в пекарне работают еще два рабочих. Зухро по натуре целеустремленная женщина. Она сейчас думает о расширении деятельности. Для реализации этой цели Зухро обратилась за кредитом, чтобы купить большое количество муки и угля, а также частично провести ремонт в своей пекарне и расширить ее. Она примет на работу еще пару рабочих и увеличит производство лепешек. 
Зухро в возрасте 54 лет имеет мужа, шестерых детей, внуков, а также собственный бизнес. Она ценит свою семью и свой бизнес, которые для нее являются смыслом жизни.
texts.en:
Zuhro is an experienced baker, who lives in the A. Jomi region, in the Khatlon area. Her business is in high demand, as she bakes traditional Tajik flatbread for sale. Flatbread is the main treat on the table for every Tajik family. Zuhro has worked as a baker for a period of more than 15 years, and her bakery is famous for delicious flatbread. There are also two other workers at her bakery. 

Zuhro is a purposeful woman by nature. She currently thinks of expanding her business. To realize this goal, Zuhro applied for a loan in order to purchase more flour and coal, and also to carry out repairs to her oven and expand it. She will employ two more workers and increase the production of flatbread. 

Zuhro is 54 years old and has a husband, six children, grandchildren and also her own business. She values her family and her business, they are to her the meaning of life.

loans.use: to purchase flour and coal, and also a to repair her oven

loans.name: Graciela

texts.es: Graciela se dedica a brindar servicio de internet entonces tiene una pequeña cabina de internet, ella es una persona responsable por ese motivo le invitaron a participar en el banco comunal “Camino al Progreso” y en esta oportunidad  requiere el préstamo para hacer mantenimiento de las computadoras, ella agradece y valora el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas mensuales con mucha responsabilidad.
texts.en:
Graciela works providing internet service since she has a small internet cafe.  She is a responsible person, so she was invited to join the Camino al Progreso community bank.  

She is requesting this loan to do maintenance on her computers.  She is grateful and values the loan.  She promises to make her monthly payments responsibly.

loans.use: to do maintenance on her computers.

loans.name: Maria Del Rosario

texts.es: Tela, pellon, botones, hilos y mucho mas, fue lo que compró Maria con su anterior credikiva. Gracias a esta inversión sus inventarios mejoraron y así mismo la producción e imagen del negocio repercutiendo este hecho en una mejor calidad de vida. Su mensaje de agradecimiento para los finaciadores por el apoyo prestado es lo primero que Maria ha expresado. Hoy está aplicando a un nuevo credikiva mediante el cual comprará tela, botones, pellon, pues necesita una vez mas, aumentar su producción para continuar creciendo.
texts.en:
Maria used her last Kiva loan to purchase fabric, trimming, buttons, needles, and other supplies.  Thanks to this investment, her inventory, her production and the image of her business improved, which gave her a better quality of life.  Her message of thanks to the lenders for their support is the first that Maria has expressed.

Today she is requesting a new Kiva loan to purchase fabric, buttons, and trimming, since she needs to increase her production to continue growing.

loans.use: to purchase supplies to sew clothing.

loans.name: Hay

texts.en:
Hay lives in the Kulen district of Preah Vihea province. He is now 58 years old, married, and has one child who is now in school. In order to support the family, he depends on the paddy rice farm which helps him earn 18,100 KHR in average per day.

He has already completed five loans with VisionFund which could help him a lot in improving his family living. He is now requesting the sixth one which he will need to pay for labor fees for the farm. He expects that the income will help him with his family expenses such as health care, food, and his child's education.

loans.use: to pay for labor fees

loans.name: Sokien

texts.en:
Sokien lives in Kulen district of Preah Vihea province. She is now 24 years old, married and has a daughter. Her daughter is in the school. She and her husband depend on the paddy rice farm to cover their family's living expense. They earn 40,900 KHR in average per day.

Sokien has completed 6 loans with VisionFund already. She saw a very good impact from the previous loans on her family and is now requesting her 7th loan from VisionFund. This loan will help her to pay for labor fees. She expects that the income will help her expand her business as well as improving her family's living especially to cover family's food, health care and her child's education.

loans.use: to pay for labor fees.
